Hey – there’s a revolution going on! A revolution in digital entertainment. Every day millions of people around the world choose to be more thoughtfully entertained, informed and educated by listening to fascinating stories and all forms of fictional and non-fictional content on their smartphones and other mobile devices.

Audible, an Amazon company, is the leading provider of premium digital spoken audio information and entertainment on the internet, offering customers a new way to enhance and enrich their lives every day. Titles downloaded from Audible are compatible with hundreds of mobile devices, including the iPhone and Android smartphones.

Based in Berlin, Audible GmbH is looking for a Working Student (Werkstudent) Business Analytics EU (m/f/x) who will support us in creating insights & build reports that help us to make critical business decisions.

Our team in Berlin works closely with stakeholders in Berlin and around the world. You will work with data and will have the opportunity to analyze customer behavior across different market places. When working on a specific analysis, you will have the opportunity to drive key business decisions with the help of marketing teams and other analysts.

Main Responsibilities:
Extract data from Redshift databases for ad-hoc analysis using SQL.Work with large data sets using various analysis tools
(MS Excel/SQL/Python/Microstrategy/R/Tableau).
Perform data validation, cross checks and plausibility checks.Recognize patterns in the data and dig deep into anomalies.Perform A/B testing on various marketing campaigns.Create customer segments for Email Targeting.

Preferred Qualifications:
Have been enrolled in economic computer science / mathematic / engineering / computer science / business administration / or similar university programs and have at least one year of your studies left.Great communication skills.
Our offer:
This is a student position for 20h/week with a salary of 12€/h.Contribution on the long-run (ideally 1 to 2 years) as a fully-fledged Team Member.Exciting opportunity to participate in the growth of a global digital audiobook provider.International work environment in a beautiful Berlin Mitte location.
Sounds interesting? If you are looking for a new challenge in an innovative company, where you will be surrounded by an engaged and fun team, Audible is your next stop!

As a Data Analyst in our Convenience Proposition Analytics team you will be regularly benchmarking Zalando’s fulfillment proposition, supporting investment decisions. You will enable evidence-based decisions with your data analysis expertise optimizing post-checkout experience at an international scale.
If you enjoy examining large amounts of data to uncover hidden patterns and trends and you surface insights as exciting stories, based on beautiful visualizations, then join us - the opportunities to make a personal impact are limitless!
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDE
Collect benchmarking data and lead statistical analyses to help our business make better decisions.
Understand and solve business challenges to achieve Operational Excellence in fluent business processes.
Work in collaboration with Software Engineering, Analytics and Product, other internal teams and resources to enable data-supported decision making.
Identify gaps and create strategies that help us and other teams scale.
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
An analytical & entrepreneurial mindset with passion for pioneering new operations from the ground up from a technical and commercial perspective
A business/data analyst with hands-on experience with statistical research techniques such as linear/non-linear regression, time-series modeling, sample size estimation, statistical tests, etc.
Experience in data engineering, ETLs, data modeling and data visualization with a high fluency in Python/R and SQL
Excellent collaboration skills, working in a fast-paced dynamic team environment.
PERKS AT WORK
A workplace run on trust, empowerment and feedback; positive, inspiring working atmosphere

The Insights – Digital Data Analyst role provides data-driven value to both our brand partners as well as internally by being the go-to person for the Analytics team as well as the consultants when it comes to transactional and onsite data analysis.
This is an opportunity to be part of the forefront team to shape a new business venture and to personally grow with it. Insights is a data-driven Zalando offer enabling clients in the fashion industry to gain a holistic understanding of their business and consumers. This offer includes project-based consulting services and self-service web interfaces.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
You will work on consulting projects by scoping, extracting, analyzing and interpreting transactional and onsite data to derive relevant insights together with our consultants.
You will develop new analytical products through e.g. predictive modeling and build minimum viable products (MVPs) in order to test them with our clients so that they can eventually be integrated into our self-service web interfaces or evolve into a standalone product.
You will analyze the success of our self-service web interfaces in terms of usage and user preferences and derive recommendations for improvement.
You will be responsible for monitoring and improving our data quality by analyzing data from various sources, coordinating with internal teams and reviewing calculation methods.
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
You are an expert in SQL and comfortable to work with large volumes of both transactional and onsite consumer data.
You enjoy working in a commercial context and have experience defining, modeling, testing and evolving analytical models with direct impact on business realities. Special focus on models concerning customers (e.g., customer management, segmentation, value, etc.) is a plus.
You possess relevant professional experience in analytics or controlling in industries such as e-business, retail, consultancy or market research are able to communicate precisely with results.
Extensive knowledge of respective tools and methods, preferably SQL, Google Analytics, BigQuery and Python combined with good mathematical and statistical foundations. Experience in forecasting and predictive models would be a plus.
You are comfortable working with combining and cleaning massive datasets and have advanced skills in data visualization

A Bachelor's degree or equivalentMinimum of one year of experience in: Fraud, Cyber Crime, Financial Crimes, or Financial Risk ManagementAbility to perform deep investigations on complex, sensitive escalations for numerous internal stakeholdersExcellent oral and written communication, along with data presentation skills and the ability to effectively communicate with both internal and external stakeholdersAbility to work effectively in a multi-task, high volume environmentAbility to be adaptable and flexible in responding to deadlines and workflow fluctuationsFlexibility to work various shifts, including working one weekend day or alternative start-end times, and voluntary overtime hours per business needsAbility to deal with high level of ambiguity

Each day, hundreds of thousands of customers make billions of transactions worldwide on our cloud. They are harnessing the power of Amazon Web Services (AWS) to enable innovative applications, websites, and businesses. However, there are always a few people that try to take unfair advantage of a good thing...

Are you interested in taking your skills and career to the next level, while having fun and fighting bad guys? Join a growing world class team to conduct investigations in order to prevent malicious and fraudulent usage on AWS.

You will be an integral member of a team of investigators, analysts and specialists conducting complex investigations of fraud activity. You will help drive related intelligence initiatives targeting new and emerging fraud threats to AWS.

You will leverage your analytical and data skills to deep dive on a myriad of fraud activity to help drive complex investigations and investigative strategies.

You will be at the forefront of keeping abreast of trends and fraud issues impacting the Cloud industry to ensure AWS is leading the curve in identifying, mitigating and preventing fraud attacks.

Are you interested in taking your skills and career to the next level, while having fun and fighting fraud in the cloud? AWS is seeking dedicated, hardworking, analytical candidates with a proven track record of performance and results-oriented thinking, to join the AWS Fraud Investigations Team. Investigators will be responsible for a wide range of duties related to the investigation and mitigation of fraud in the Cloud.

Ideal applicants will have experience in the Cloud industry, previous fraud experience, and proven success in a customer-driven workplace. All candidates will be analytical and capable of succeeding in a fast-paced team environment. The Investigation Specialist position entails shift work, potentially evenings and Saturdays. Specific shift requirements to be based on needs of the business.

This position relies on judgment to plan and accomplish goals with nearly all decisions expected to be made independently with a high degree of accuracy and attention to detail. Individual problem-solving and analytical skills are used to authenticate customers’ cloud computing behavior and complex transactions on AWS accounts.
Responsibilities include:
Conduct complex and deep dive investigations of sophisticated criminals and criminal enterprisesUse a combination of manual and automated tools to gather data and conduct ad-hoc investigationsWork with cross-functional teams across Amazon for collaboration on fraud risks and investigationsWork with stakeholders to drive process improvements that will impact internal and external customersMaintain the confidentiality of all information obtained during the investigations processTake on ad-hoc projects/assignments related to fraud investigations as necessary.

Experience countering fraud in a technology services organization or similar environmentExperience in e-commerce/on-line companies in fraud/risk control functions
Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build.
Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Hohe Organisationsfähigkeit

Wir bieten Dir:
Hohe Flexibilität: Damit Privates nicht zu kurz kommt, unterstützen wir Dich mit flexiblen Arbeitszeitmodellen – Gleitzeit in Vollzeit oder Teilzeit.
Attraktive Zusatzleistungen: Erfreue Dich neben dem Fixgehalt an einer Beteiligung am Konzern- und Unternehmenserfolg sowie einem Zuschuss zu vermögenswirksamen Leistungen.
Ausgefallene Feiern: Wir veranstalten After-Work-Partys, Team-Events und Sommer- & Weihnachtsfeiern.
Selbstverständliche Angebote: Wir bieten Dir kostenlose Obstkörbe und Wasserspender für Deine tägliche Versorgung am Arbeitsplatz.
Vielfältige Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten: Wir bieten eine Vielzahl an internen Weiterbildungsangeboten, sowie persönliche E-Learning-Angebote - auch für zu Hause.
Starke Sportangebote: Wir bieten Rabatte für Fitnessstudios in der Umgebung und veranstalten Firmenläufe, an denen wir als Team antreten.
Gesundheitliche Fürsorge: Mithilfe unseres Betriebssozialdienstes und eigener Betriebsärzte kümmern wir uns um Deine Gesundheit.
Neue Chancen: Auch als Berufs- oder Quereinsteiger erhältst Du die Möglichkeit, Dich in abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben einzuarbeiten.
Offene Unternehmenskultur: Wir stehen für Vielfalt im Unternehmen - und das in jeder Hinsicht.
Tolle Aussichten: In einem dynamischen und gleichzeitig zukunftssicheren Arbeitsumfeld mit Aufstiegsperspektiven erhältst Du einen befristeten Arbeitsvertrag mit der Möglichkeit zur unbefristeten Übernahme.
Das sind wir:
Mal ehrlich: Finanzthemen sind kompliziert. Darum sind wir bei Arvato Financial Solutions stolz darauf, sowohl international agierende als auch renommierte, lokale Unternehmen durch die komplexe Welt der Zahlungsströme zu steuern. Ganz gleich ob unsere Kunden im E-Commerce Schuhe verkaufen oder Telekommunikationsdienstleistungen anbieten, unsere Dienstleistungen sichern effizientes Credit Management für bestmögliche finanzielle Performance. Dazu lösen unsere rund 7.500 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter täglich neue Herausforderungen im Zahlungsverkehr und komplexe Datenrätsel – clever, analytisch und mit Blick für jedes Detail – denn das ist unsere DNA. Wir suchen Kolleginnen und Kollegen, die Lust haben mitzugestalten und genau hinzuschauen - egal ob Berufsanfänger, IT-Spezialisten, Data Analysten, Sachbearbeiter, Führungskräfte oder Quereinsteiger. Und dank unserer Präsenz in rund 20 Ländern mit Fokus auf Europa und Amerika ist ein passender Job zumeist in der Nähe. Innovate yourself.
Im Geschäftsbereich Accounting und Payment bieten wir konkrete Antworten auf die Herausforderungen unser Kunden, insbesondere wenn es um die Erschließung von Kaufkraft, internationaler Märkte, das Stärken der Kundenbeziehung und die Digitalisierung von Unternehmen geht. Dazu setzen wir auf passgenaue Gesamtpakete, Plattformen sowie den gezielten Einsatz von Robots, künstlicher Intelligenz und Big Data Analytics.

Wir halten was wir versprechen:
Mehr Informationen unter www.innovateyourself.de. Bist Du schon überzeugt? Dann freuen wir uns auf Deine aussagekräftige Online-Bewerbung mit Gehaltsvorstellung und frühestmöglichen Eintrittsdatum.

As a Product Analyst, you will be working in the Performance Measurement product team. You will collaborate with data scientists, economists, engineers and product managers. You will help designing an advanced system allowing Zalando to optimize its investments in performance marketing. You will proactively analyze data on the lookout for minor and major problems as well as opportunities. You will translate your findings into action plans with the product managers. In addition, you will benefit from a network of Product Analysts, who share similar challenges across the company, to learn and develop your skills.

WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED


Challenge and contribute to product decisions based on data insights as well as your deep understanding of Zalando's business
Give evidence why we do certain things - from discovery to roll out.
Build dashboards to present the output of our products in the most intuitive way so our stakeholders are enabled to make optimal strategic decisions.
Develop in-depth analytical understanding for our data-driven products. Implement and monitor product KPIs to create transparency on the quality of our products.

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR


A degree from a university in a numerate subject (e.g. Economics, Science, Engineering, Business)
Applicable work experience in analytics, ideally in an e-commerce context.
Ability to formulate clear problem statements and hypotheses based on data insights.
SQL and / or Python experience for deep dives into our data.
Excellent communication skills, both written and oral.
Experience in product management is a plus.

PERKS AT WORK


Culture of trust, empowerment and constructive feedback,open source ( https://opensource.zalando.com/ ) commitment, meetups, game nights, 70+ internal technical and fun guilds, knowledge sharing through tech talks, internal tech academy andblogs ( https://jobs.zalando.com/tech/blog/ ), product demos, parties & events

We are looking for a proactive data-driven person to develop, refine and manage KPIs for a variety of projects and products. As a Senior BI Analyst, you should be able to design solutions for complex problems that involve multiple business areas.
Your responsibilities will be:
Evaluating the performance of products and derive concrete suggestions for future action strategies
Producing sound, quantitative, and actionable data insights
Building and implementing machine learning models and prototype solutions for prediction problems in large scale
Defining KPIs and reporting for business areas together with responsible stakeholders
Managing and supporting ad-hoc projects in support of driving business insights, intelligence, or business process efficiency/improvements
Extracting and aggregating data from various sources (e.g. Google Analytics, Firebase, Salesforce, etc.)
Reporting through clean and reliable dashboards in Tableau
Managing and helping the development of your junior colleagues
Qualifications
What you'll bring to the team:
University degree in economics, statistics, mathematics, natural sciences, business informatics, or similar
4+ years of work experience in a similar role
Knowledge of Tableau, Looker, SiSense or other, similar BI tool
Sound knowledge of SQL and relational databases
Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills
Problem-solving mindset
Ability to communicate effectively with business stakeholders
Fluent in English
What makes you stand out:
Experience in product analytics
Marketplace knowledge
Knowledge of scientific programming language, libraries and patterns (Python, R, Pandas, Scikit-learn, SciPy, etc.)
Experience with Big Query
Experience with web/mobile-tracking tools (e.g. GA, Firebase)
Additional Information
What we offer:
Attractive perks – access to Quandoo’s pension scheme as well as various fitness and lifestyle benefits
Modern equipment – state-of-the-art laptop & tools needed for optimal work results
Fun working environment – opportunity to collaborate with highly motivated colleagues and attend company parties, the weekly Qweekend and Quandoo’s Global Summit
Work-home balance – flexible working hours, home office possibilities and up to 30 days of vacation
High level of responsibility – the chance to hit the ground running from day one and shape your own career path
Want to be part of Quandoo’s future? Apply now!
Sounds like a cool job, but not for yourself? Please feel free to share this job description with your network!

We created CareerFoundry to help others build their careers while maintaining personal freedom and flexibility. Our 100% online, flexible and Mentor/Tutor driven courses are setting the standard for globally accessible technical education.

We are looking for experienced and passionate Data Analysts all over the world to join our pool of experts and help define the next generation by educating and empowering students across the globe. Our global team consists of over 230 Mentors and Tutors in the Web Development, UX design, and UI design, and now Data Analysis sectors. Our Mentor and Tutor body includes freelancers, entrepreneurs, consultants, and agency directors who passionately guide, motivate, and empower our students to create new careers in the tech industry. We are constantly searching for more teaching enthusiasts like you to join us.

YOUR MISSION:
Mentoring and Tutoring with CareerFoundry is more than teaching. It is inspiring newcomers to the field to build, to problem solve, to think like a Data Analyst and to increase their value as professionals. With their expertise from the field, our Mentors and Tutors provide guidance and encouragement to their students each step of the way.

Based on your application and experience, we will make a decision on whether the Tutor or Mentor role is the perfect fit for you.

Tutor role:
With their expertise from the field, Tutors work with Mentors to provide guidance and encouragement to their students each step of the way. To do this, Tutors provide feedback and constructive criticism on submissions, help students understand the lessons, and ask and answer questions about the materials to deepen their understanding of the core concepts. You’ll be:


Regularly reviewing student projects submitted through the CareerFoundry platform
Portfolio reviews and checking for fundamental understanding of concepts
Working alongside a Mentor (who has 8+ years of experience)
Suggesting supplemental learning materials and personal insights in areas where students are struggling
Responding to students within 12 -24 hours

Mentor role:
Most students will be beginners and are looking not only for help and experience to master the necessary skills, but also inspiration and motivation to keep them focused along the way. Mentors review students work on a regular basis with a view to how it would fit into an industry-ready portfolio. Additionally, they book one-on-one video calls to help prepare students for their entry into this new industry. They’re going to want to know how you got your start, how you network, how you decide which companies and roles to go for, and much more! Your role would involve:


Reviewing student projects submitted through the CareerFoundry platform
Portfolio reviews and checking for fundamental understanding of concepts
Working alongside a Tutor
Suggesting supplemental learning materials and personal insights in areas where students are struggling
Responding to students within 48 hours

Requirements:
To succeed as a Mentor or Tutor, you need to have a real drive to pass on your secrets for success to the next generation of design talent.

Tutor role


2+ years of professional Data Analysis experience
A great portfolio to support your experience
In depth knowledge of industry best practices
A friendly personality and a strong desire to help others

Mentor role


You have 5+ years’ experience in Data Analysis with a demonstrable track record showcasing your work for a variety of clients and companies.
A first class portfolio with rock solid, relevant references to back it up.
Ideally, you will already have gained experience in teaching or you have the right attitude and skills for it: you have time and patience for beginners and a strong desire to guide people along their career path in this field, with knowledge of the latest design tools, a broad network of experts in the field and an in-depth understanding of industry practices.

For both roles a knowledge of the following is required:
Data Processing and Querying


SQL
Excel
Python (and pandas library)
Relational databases

Data Visualization and Reporting


End-to-end analysis
Tableau
Presenting data
Data visualizations and data dashboards
Power Bi (data viz tool)
Storytelling

Statistical Analysis


R

Business


Understanding and formulating business metrics/KPIs
Understanding how data relates to product requirements
Designing and scoping research projects and experiments
Ethics in data analysis

What’s in it for you:

Flexible and mobile– work from anywhere with an internet connection
Educational – deepen your own knowledge by teaching it to others, plus work alongside a Mentor or Tutor who will also assist with your own professional development
Fulfilling – directly impact students’ personal growth, and help them succeed in their goals
Résumé gold – mentoring and teaching experience is highly sought after by employers everywhere

job_title: Business Process Analyst in Digital Marketing Operations (m/f/d)
full_text:
Company Description

About Publicis Emil
Headquartered in Berlin, Publicis Emil is a bespoke global agency within Publicis Groupe for Daimler (Mercedes-Benz, smart). We are on a single-minded mission to help accelerate their journey to become the world’s automotive digital champion.
To do this, we have drawn on the best talent from agencies across the Groupe: cutting-edge expertise and diverse skills as one integrated end-to-end agency to serve advertising and marketing, digital experience & services, data intelligence and analytics, CRM, web and social commerce as well as local dealer communications.
We work with data at the heart to give Daimler’s entire marketing organization the ability to make better and smarter decisions.
We put customer centricity at the heart of everything we do, using ‘living’ customer profiles and journeys to engage people for purchases and beyond.
We are agile, collaborative and interdisciplinary. As we establish new teams across borders, we will ensure our work culture continues to reflect the spirit and behaviors that convinced Daimler that we should be their transformation partner.
We are pioneering the agency model of the future, recognizing that our success will be as much about the digital transformation and growth of our client, as it will be about the development and fulfilment of our people.

Job Description

We operate across 3 regions and 39 markets for our client, steering a multitude of global projects to drive digital marketing transformation and activate measures to market Daimler products and services.
The goal of this role is to review existing processes of how markets are running their digital marketing initiatives, engaging with the delivery hubs (content management, DMP and personalization, CRM and Data analytics) to optimize lead generation measures and improve our ability to add value for our client more efficiently and effectively.
Conduct stakeholder interviews, map out and analyze existing processes across delivery hubs, markets, regional and global teams
Facilitate process workshops that involve eliciting process requirements and liaising with users
Collect and document business requirements for project and process improvement
Identify gaps and inefficiencies as well as opportunities to streamline existing processes
Suggest possible short-term quick fix solutions
Facilitate process workflow modeling and collaborate with the Customer Journey Integration Manager on process improvements, automation opportunities and clearly defined end-to-end use cases
Deploy effective business improvement approaches, tools and techniques
Bring inconsistencies and problems to the attention of management
Create framework for non-standard activations
Understand escalation requirements within the various activation centers and create incident management process
Educate users responsible for managing and operating business processes

Qualifications

5+ years of professional experience
Experience with Digital Marketing Operations processes in the global environment with Central-Regional-Local structures is required
Experience as a Business Analyst in a consultancy required
Advanced knowledge of Project Management and Process Definition methodologies and software
Experience with setting up, merging and optimizing JIRA instances as well as corresponding workflows and definitions
Good understanding of MarTech solutions (CMS, DMP, CRM, Web-Analytics)
Additional Information

null

Job Description

If you are exploring option for europe settlement you may apply for this position.

Professionals from the IT sector under any profile (development_testing_technical solutions) are required in various fields, such as, technology, manufacturing, automotive, telecommunications, internet services, software publishing, and many others.

Software Developer (Java)
PHP Developer
Cyber Security Analyst
Network Security Specialist
System Administrator
Test Automation Engineer
Security Architect
RPA Developer
SAP ABAP Developer
Data Analyst

Find more details at alexiontalent.com


Info: Alexion Talent has opportunities across Europe and MENA for Professionals, who have an exceptional track record of driving impact for clients in various industries and various countries. As a candidate, you would be selected through professional, progressive stages, to be a best fit for the client and find a promising career for yourself. If you are in search for a new opportunity to bring out your experience and potential, we would like to meet you immediately.

job_title: Data Integration Manager (f/m/div) at solarisbank AG
full_text:
solarisBank is the world's first banking platform enabling businesses to create custom solutions for their financial needs. The core of the company is a fast and modern technology which makes our banking services quick to setup and simple to build. With a full EU banking license, we combine agile engineering with the regulatory expertise of a fully licensed bank.

By combining digital focus, tech expertise, and banking experience we enable our partners to offer various digital financial services to their end-consumer. Our Banking Platform is built in a modular way allowing partners to easily integrate through APIs and access a range of solutions, including BKYC, Digital Banking, Cards, Payments, and Lending. We also partner with trusted third parties to offer additional services e.g. FX, KYC.

solarisBank was founded in March 2016 in Berlin receiving full EU Banking License within 9 months of operating. We are now active in 7+ EU countries via passporting of the banking license and reaching over 2 million end-customers via 50+ partners. Following two successful funding rounds, solarisBank received approx. 95m EUR of funding from strategic investors such as Arvato, BBVA, Lakestar, Visa, SBI Group, ABN AMRO and FinLeap.

Data Engineers, Data Analysts and DWH experts are working closely together in our Data Team at solarisBank. Our main goal is to ensure the data availability for internal and external processes and to deliver exceptional analyses to ensure excellent business decision-making. We work closely together with our five cross-functional business units as well as our internal functional teams.

We want to grow our team and are looking for a Data Integration Manager. Your main contribution is to manage entire projects in which data needs to be provided by our several product teams to our Data Platform.

Your Role & Responsibilities


You will be the project manager for data integration projects at solarisBank
This includes project planning & monitoring as well as clearly defining and communicating expected deliverables
You make sure that key stakeholders understand the purpose of the project and timelines
You will be in charge of defining data requirements, consulted by experts from the Data Team
You will collaborate closely with our product teams and act as go-to-person to coordinate between product teams and Data Team

Our Perfect Match


Minimum 3 years of proven experience in Project Management and/or Consulting
Strong analytical thinking and fast understanding
Accurate in defining, documenting and communicating requirements
Excellent communication skills (in English)
Bachelor or Master degree in business, economics, project management or similar
Experience in banking/FinTech is a plus
Experience in regulatory reporting (Meldewesen)
Recognized project management certification is a plus (e.g. PMP, PRINCE2)
Experience in data analytics is a plus

Our Organization:

We are a tech company with a banking license and we change banking forever. We combine the best from the digital world with our unique tech-enabled platform banking approach.
Take a deep breath – and get ready to grow at the speed of light: We're a young company and you can shape our destiny from day one.
You'll join a team of experts from tech, entrepreneurship and banking. It's an exclusive combination you'll find in few places other than solarisBank.
We're growing rapidly – and you will grow with us. We have a true hands-on mentality which creates lots of opportunities for individual growth.

At solarisBank, we are committed to nurture an inclusive environment, where all solarians feel valued, respected and supported. We are dedicated to build a diverse workforce that reflects the diversity of our communicates. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of color, race, religion, sex, origin, disability, marital status, citizenship, or gender identity. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer.

Information on data processing:
DE: https://www.solarisbank.com/gdpr_notice_de ( https://www.solarisbank.com/gdpr_notice_de )

EN: https://www.solarisbank.com/gdpr_notice_en ( https://www.solarisbank.com/gdpr_notice_en )

As a Product Analyst for Zalando Gift Cards, your mission is to deeply understand how people express affection through gifts, enabling us to build the most exquisite gifting experience for our 27+ million active customers across all our existing markets. Working with multiple cross-functional teams you will have end-to-end ownership of data. You will define how we track and analyse large datasets to gain deep understanding of our customers and provide actionable insights that help us develop superior products.

WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED


Develop in-depth analytical (user) understanding for what drives growth for products and how they can be improved
Develop sophisticated tools to ensure Product and Marketing can track traffic and conversion through the funnel
Provide analyses for a diverse range of drill down challenges, with requirements defined by Product and Marketing
Challenge and contribute to product decisions based on your insights
Drive data mindset in the team, guide in terms of methodology, support and execute testing, and be a quality gatekeeper on data leading to product decisions, even ask to revise decisions that contradict the analytical insights. Give (analytical) evidence why we do certain things - from discovery to roll out.

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR


BigQuery / SQL
Google Datastudio
R or Python combined to good mathematical and statistics foundations
Strong knowledge of A/B testing best practices and relevant technologies
Strong knowledge of e-commerce KPIs and how they can be defined

PERKS AT WORK


A workplace run on trust, empowerment and feedback; positive, inspiring working atmosphere
Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
Relocation assistance for internationals, PME family service and parent & child rooms* (*available in select locations)

We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

-------------
ABOUT ZALANDO
-------------

Zalando is Europe's leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 23 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests andlanguages ( https://opensource.zalando.com/tech-radar/ ) our teams choose to use.

Als eine der führenden Strategie- und Managementberatungen für die europäische Finanzwelt konzipieren wir maßgeschneiderte, innovative Lösungen mit unseren Kunden und setzen sie um. In der IT-Beratung sind wir Partner der Fach- und IT-Abteilungen und unterstützen ganzheitlich von der IT-Strategie über die Konzeption bis zur Umsetzung.

Kommen Sie in unser Team, profitieren Sie von unserem transparenten Karrieremodell, das Ihre Leistung 1:1 honoriert. Unsere wertschätzende, von Respekt und Fairness geprägte Unternehmenskultur ist dabei die beste Basis für Ihren Erfolg als

Bachelorabsolvent (w/m/d) als Analyst im IT-Consulting
Office:
Berlin, Frankfurt am Main, Hamburg, München, Münster, Wien
Ihr Profil:
Ihr Bachelorstudium (Wirtschafts-)Informatik, BWL mit Schwerpunkt Informatik, Physik, (Wirtschafts-)Mathematik ist erfolgreich beendet.
In Praktika oder einer Ausbildung haben Sie die Prozesse von Finanzdienstleistern oder die Arbeitsweise in Beratungen kennengelernt.
Software, Datenbanken und/oder Data-Warehouse-Lösungen entwickeln Sie selbstständig. Sie denken analytisch und gehen strukturiert vor.
In Projektteams überzeugen Sie als neugieriger Teamplayer, der strategisch-kreativ denkt und kundenorientiert handelt.
Die MS-Office-Produkte beherrschen Sie ebenso sicher wie Englisch in Wort und Schrift; Auslanderfahrungen sind ein Plus.
Ihre Aufgaben:
Als Analyst (w/m/d) arbeiten Sie ein Jahr im IT Consulting. Danach absolvieren Sie Ihr Masterstudium, bei dem wir Sie finanziell fördern.
Von Anfang an arbeiten Sie als Projektmitglied im Team an der Schnittstelle zwischen IT und Business.
Sie analysieren die Kundenbedürfnisse und bereiten Ihre Ergebnisse strukturiert sowie verständlich z. B. in MS Excel und PowerPoint auf.
Schnell übernehmen Sie Verantwortung für eigene Arbeitspakete und tragen zum Projekt- und Ihrem eigenen Erfolg bei.
Nehmen Sie an unseren attraktiven Seminaren sowie anderen Weiterbildungsformaten teil und entwickeln Sie sich permanent weiter.

Ihre Benefits
Career
Orientierung bekommen Sie vom Mentor, dem Career Development Counselor, um Ihre Karriereziele zu verwirklichen. Ein umfangreicher Trainingskatalog bietet Personalentwicklungsmaßnahmen für jede Funktionsstufe.
Culture
In unseren interdisziplinären Teams pflegen wir eine Unternehmenskultur auf Augenhöhe. Argument schlägt Hierarchie. Projekteinsätze sind entsprechend Ihrer Interessen in mehreren Ländern Europas möglich.
Choice
Den Office Standort und die Practice Group als thematische Heimat wählen Sie selbst entsprechend Ihrer persönlichen Interessen.
Conditions
Als Analyst im Bachelor-Welcome-Programm erhalten Sie von zeb eine Studienförderung für Ihr Master Studium.

As a Product Specialist in Personalized Marketing, you will participate in the development of new features for our advertising products, which drive the growth of our business. Doing so, you will gain deep domain knowledge and become an expert.
You will have end-to-end ownership of data: define tracking requirements, analyse large datasets to provide actionable insights, A/B test and dive deep into the results of our performance marketing activities.
In addition, you will benefit from a network of Product Analysts, economists and data scientists who share similar challenges across the company, to learn and develop your skills.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
Develop in-depth analytical (user) understanding for what drives growth for Facebook marketing and how it can be improved
Challenge and contribute to product decisions based on your insights
Drive data mindset in the team, guide in terms of methodology, support and execute testing, and be a quality gatekeeper on data leading to product decisions, even ask to revise decisions that contradict the analytical insights
Give (analytical) evidence why we do certain things - from discovery to roll out.


WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
BigQuery / SQL
R or Python combined to good mathematical and statistics foundations
Strong knowledge of A/B testing best practices and relevant technologies
Strong knowledge of e-commerce KPIs and how they can be defined


PERKS AT WORK
A workplace run on trust, empowerment and feedback; positive, inspiring working atmosphere
Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
Relocation assistance for internationals, PME family service and parent & child rooms* (*available in select locations)
We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
ABOUT ZALANDO
Zalando is Europe’s leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 23 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests and languages our teams choose to use.

Als Teil unseres Teams kannst Du Dich auf Freiheit, ein internationales und inspirierendes Arbeitsumfeld freuen. Deine Ideen sind uns dabei besonders wichtig. Nicht nur unser Produktportfolio ist vielfältig, sondern auch die Menschen, die daran arbeiten. Wir wollen dich so, wie du bist! Dabei spielen Herkunft, Religion, Geschlecht, sexuelle Orientierung oder ein Schwerbehinderungsgrad keine Rolle.
Deine Aufgaben
Als Teil unseres Teams übernimmst Du die Verantwortung für das gesamte Customer Experience Reporting und die BI Roadmap. Um diese Themen zu übernehmen, arbeitest Du mit diversen Teams (z.B. Merchant Performance, Customer Trust, Customer Care und Payments) an strategisch relevanten Themen zusammen und treibst diese voran
Auf Basis relevanter Datensätze stellst Du die Optimierung unseres positiven Kauferlebnisses sicher und leitest ggf. Handlungsempfehlungen ab, um dieses zu verbessern
Die Optimierung des ganzheitlichen Kauferlebnisses unserer Kund*innen durch die Analyse relevanter Datensätze und die Ableitung / Empfehlung geeigneter Maßnahmen liegen in Deiner Hand
Du baust ein Data Analysis Framework und eine Customer - Centric Datenbank auf, mit der unsere Teams täglich arbeiten können und relevante KPI's für das operative Geschäft ablesen können
Außerdem kümmerst Du Dich um die Erstellung und Visualisierung neuer Reports, um Ausreißer schneller erkennen zu können und Maßnahmen effizienter abzuleiten
Du bist für den Aufbau einer Kund*innen CRM Logik / Systematik verantwortlich, die es uns ermöglichen soll , gezielter auf die Bedürfnisse unserer Kund*innen einzugehen und, insbesondere bei konkreten Problemfällen, schneller helfen zu können
Stellenanforderungen
Das bringst Du mit
Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium in einem relevanten Fachgebiet sowie mehrjährige Erfahrungen in Customer Centric Attribution und -Analytics
Du verstehst die Stärken und Schwächen diverser Messansätze und mathematischer Modelle im Kern und kannst diese entsprechend als Entscheidungsgrundlage berücksichtigen
Sehr starke Zahlenaffinität, hervorragende analytische Fähigkeiten sowie ein guter Überblick über aktuelle Entwicklungen in den Bereichen Data Management und Data Science gehören zu Deinem Repertoire
Datenkonsistenz, (statistisch) valide Testaufbauten und Messansätze, die bereits in der Kampagnengestaltung berücksichtigt werden, sind Dir äußerst wichtig
Du bist Spezialist*in in SQL, Tableau und MS Excel - auch neue Technologien reizen Dich
Idealerweise kennst Du den E-Commerce Markt und kennst die Bedürfnisse von Shops
Bei idealo erwartet Dich
Die Möglichkeit der Weiterbildung für Deine individuelle Karriere
Die Bereitstellung der Arbeitsgeräte, die Du benötigst, um Höchstleistungen zu bringen
Der Freiraum, selbst zu bestimmen, wie Dein Tag aussehen soll und viel Eigenverantwortung
Onboarding Programm inklusive Welcome Day, Schulungen und individueller Einarbeitung
Die Chance, gemeinsam an unseren Zielen zu arbeiten und immer wieder Neues zu schaffen
800 motivierte Kolleg*innen, Kitaplätze & ein cooler Büro-Loft Komplex in Berlin-Kreuzberg
Über idealo

idealo ist eine Erfolgsgeschichte aus Berlin: Im Jahr 2000 sind wir mit der Mission gestartet, unseren Nutzer*innen zu helfen, richtige Kaufentscheidungen zu treffen. Im Herzen Berlins arbeiten über 800 Mitarbeiter aus 40 Nationen an der Zukunft des Online-Shopping. Wir konzentrieren uns auf agiles und eigenverantwortliches Arbeiten, Nachhaltigkeit und ein gesundes Verhältnis von Arbeit und Privatleben. Diese Werte sind fest in unserer Unternehmenskultur verankert und tragender Bestandteil unserer Unternehmensphilosophie.

Your profile:
You are proficient in SQL / ETL, preferably with hands on experience from a business environment.You are proficient in MS Excel: You know how to work with VLOOKUP, SUMIF(S), INDEX, MATCH and other functions, you use Pivot Tables.You are fluent in English, both written and spoken.You have a passion for data and are curious to always dig deep to uncover patterns.You are self-driven and motivated to learn and explore.You don’t mind a bit of chaos. Actually, you embrace it as something that provides all kinds of opportunities.You love solving problems.You are enrolled in a Berlin university for a full-time degree.

Hey – there’s a revolution going on! A revolution in digital entertainment. Every day millions of people around the world choose to be more thoughtfully entertained, informed and educated by listening to fascinating stories and all forms of fictional and non-fictional content on their smartphones and other mobile devices.

Audible, an Amazon company, is the leading provider of premium digital spoken audio information and entertainment on the internet, offering customers a new way to enhance and enrich their lives every day. Titles downloaded from Audible are compatible with hundreds of mobile devices, including the iPhone and Android smartphones.

Based in Berlin, Audible GmbH is looking for a Working Student (Werkstudent) Business Analytics EU (m/f/x) who will support us in creating insights & build reports that help us to make critical business decisions.

Our team in Berlin works closely with stakeholders in Berlin and around the world. You will work with data and will have the opportunity to analyze customer behavior across different market places. When working on a specific analysis, you will have the opportunity to drive key business decisions with the help of marketing teams and other analysts.

Main Responsibilities:
Extract data from Redshift databases for ad-hoc analysis using SQL.Work with large data sets using various analysis tools
(MS Excel/SQL/Python/Microstrategy/R/Tableau).
Perform data validation, cross checks and plausibility checks.Recognize patterns in the data and dig deep into anomalies.Perform A/B testing on various marketing campaigns.Create customer segments for Email Targeting.

Preferred Qualifications:
Have been enrolled in economic computer science / mathematic / engineering / computer science / business administration / or similar university programs and have at least one year of your studies left.Great communication skills.
Our offer:
This is a student position for 20h/week with a salary of 12€/h.Contribution on the long-run (ideally 1 to 2 years) as a fully-fledged Team Member.Exciting opportunity to participate in the growth of a global digital audiobook provider.International work environment in a beautiful Berlin Mitte location.
Sounds interesting? If you are looking for a new challenge in an innovative company, where you will be surrounded by an engaged and fun team, Audible is your next stop!

We are looking forward to your application with all details together with your cover letter. When it comes to tools, skills etc. we would appreciate if you could not only let us know which tools you know, but also your level of expertise.

As a Data Analyst in our Convenience Proposition Analytics team you will be regularly benchmarking Zalando’s fulfillment proposition, supporting investment decisions. You will enable evidence-based decisions with your data analysis expertise optimizing post-checkout experience at an international scale.
If you enjoy examining large amounts of data to uncover hidden patterns and trends and you surface insights as exciting stories, based on beautiful visualizations, then join us - the opportunities to make a personal impact are limitless!
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDE
Collect benchmarking data and lead statistical analyses to help our business make better decisions.
Understand and solve business challenges to achieve Operational Excellence in fluent business processes.
Work in collaboration with Software Engineering, Analytics and Product, other internal teams and resources to enable data-supported decision making.
Identify gaps and create strategies that help us and other teams scale.
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
An analytical & entrepreneurial mindset with passion for pioneering new operations from the ground up from a technical and commercial perspective
A business/data analyst with hands-on experience with statistical research techniques such as linear/non-linear regression, time-series modeling, sample size estimation, statistical tests, etc.
Experience in data engineering, ETLs, data modeling and data visualization with a high fluency in Python/R and SQL
Excellent collaboration skills, working in a fast-paced dynamic team environment.

As a Product Analyst in Team Attribution, you will be a part of a high-impact team that plays a pivotal role in optimizing Zalando's onsite content.
We build attribution models quantifying the financial impact of Zalando's inspirational features & campaigns.
You will be empowering our biggest client partners as well as internal stakeholders to analyze media content on Zalando web and app-based on real-time data. Your primary role would involve deep-diving into our vast data sources to develop creative solutions & analyses providing insights to our stakeholders.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
Work with large, complex data sets applying advanced analytical methods to solve challenging use cases & customer problems.
Develop and automate reports, iteratively build and prototype dashboards to provide insights at scale, solving for business priorities.

The Insights – Digital Data Analyst role provides data-driven value to both our brand partners as well as internally by being the go-to person for the Analytics team as well as the consultants when it comes to transactional and onsite data analysis.
This is an opportunity to be part of the forefront team to shape a new business venture and to personally grow with it. Insights is a data-driven Zalando offer enabling clients in the fashion industry to gain a holistic understanding of their business and consumers. This offer includes project-based consulting services and self-service web interfaces.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
You will work on consulting projects by scoping, extracting, analyzing and interpreting transactional and onsite data to derive relevant insights together with our consultants.
You will develop new analytical products through e.g. predictive modeling and build minimum viable products (MVPs) in order to test them with our clients so that they can eventually be integrated into our self-service web interfaces or evolve into a standalone product.
You will analyze the success of our self-service web interfaces in terms of usage and user preferences and derive recommendations for improvement.
You will be responsible for monitoring and improving our data quality by analyzing data from various sources, coordinating with internal teams and reviewing calculation methods.
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
You are an expert in SQL and comfortable to work with large volumes of both transactional and onsite consumer data.
You enjoy working in a commercial context and have experience defining, modeling, testing and evolving analytical models with direct impact on business realities. Special focus on models concerning customers (e.g., customer management, segmentation, value, etc.) is a plus.
You possess relevant professional experience in analytics or controlling in industries such as e-business, retail, consultancy or market research are able to communicate precisely with results.
Extensive knowledge of respective tools and methods, preferably SQL, Google Analytics, BigQuery and Python combined with good mathematical and statistical foundations. Experience in forecasting and predictive models would be a plus.
You are comfortable working with combining and cleaning massive datasets and have advanced skills in data visualization

job_title: Portfolio and Risk Analyst (m/w/div) für PAIR Finance
full_text:
Bereit den Markt zu verändern?
Dann werde Teil unserer Erfolgsgeschichte, werde Teil der “PAIR Finance-Familie”!

Du bist ein erfahrener Analyst mit herausragendem finanzmathematischen Verständnis? Dann unterstütze unser gemeinsames Wachstum und bringe den Bereich Portfolio und Risk entscheidend voran. Werde Teil unseres starken, internationalen Teams, das mit Innovationskraft und Leidenschaft die traditionelle Inkassobranche nachhaltig verändert!

Deine Aufgaben:

Im Rahmen von Portfoliokäufen von Non-Performing Loans (NPL) bewertest du Ankaufsportfolien und deren Ausfallrisiken
Du beurteilst eigenverantwortlich weitere Datenquellen (z.B. Auskunfteien) für die Entscheidungsfindung im Modell
Du erstellst Kaufpreisempfehlungen für die Geschäftsführung zum Forderungskauf
Gemeinsam mit der Geschäftsführung stehst du in regelmäßigem Austausch mit Banken und weiteren Refinanzierungspartnern
Du überwachst die Performance der übernommenen Portfolien, erstellst Performance- und Abweichungsanalysen und entwickelst in Zusammenarbeit mit dem Data Science und Operations Team Strategien zur Performanceoptimierung und zum Controlling unserer Finanzen
In enger Zusammenarbeit mit unserem Data Science & Analytics Team entwickelst du Score Cards und finanzmathematische Modelle (u.a. Regressionsmodelle) zur Beurteilung der Schuldnerbonität und entsprechenden Realisationswahrscheinlichkeit
Du bist in ständigem Austausch zum Data Science, Operations und Legal Team, um externe Effekte in deiner Entscheidungsfindung sofort zu berücksichtigen

Was wir von dir erwarten:

Du verfügst über mindestens 4 Jahre Berufserfahrung im Bereich Risikomanagement oder Risikoanalyse und Portfoliobewertung, idealerweise bei einer Unternehmensberatung oder im Finanzsektor (z.B. Inkassounternehmen, Banken, Ratingagenturen)
Du besitzt ein sehr gut abgeschlossenes wirtschafts- oder naturwissenschaftliches Studium mit quantitativem Fokus
Du hast ein sehr gutes finanzmathematisches Verständnis und hast Erfahrung im Aufbau von Finanzmodellen und Portfolioanalysen
Du besitzt sehr gute Excel Kenntnisse (u.a. VBA)
Du verfügst über einen hohen Grad an Eigeninitiative, Teamspirit sowie Kommunikationsstärke und hast Spaß daran, proaktiv Lösungen zu finden
Du besitzt sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse


Was wir dir bieten:

Herausfordernde, abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben für Deine steile Lernkurve.
Individuelle Entwicklungsangebote sowie eine transparente, wertschätzende Feedbackkultur für Deine persönliche Weiterentwicklung.
Ein internationales Team mit professionellen Kollegen und starken Experten für ein inspirierendes Netzwerk.
Team Events für ein erfolgreiches Team.
Gutes Gehalt für Deine starken Leistungen.
Flexible Arbeitszeitgestaltung und 28 Urlaubstage für Deine ausgewogene Work-Life-Balance.
Betriebliche Altersvorsorge und weitere Vergünstigungen für Dein volles Wohlfühlpaket.
Modernes Office mit frischen Früchten, Müsli und Getränken für ein angenehmes Arbeitsumfeld.

Über PAIR Finance:
Digital, effizient und kundenorientiert - unter diesen Leitlinien hat PAIR Finance einen revolutionären Ansatz für das Forderungsmanagement entwickelt, um den Inkassomarkt nachhaltig zu verändern. Wir sind Technologieführer und arbeiten als Innovationstreiber an einer der innovativsten Technologien am Markt. Unsere Technologie entwickeln wir unter Einbeziehung neuester Erkenntnisse aus der Verhaltensforschung - ein Zusammenspiel aus Technologie und Psychologie.

Als Teil des größten Fintech-Hub Europas und gestärkt durch die Partnerschaften mit Investoren wie Zalando Payments und finleap bietet PAIR Finance eine ausgezeichnete Möglichkeit, tief in die Fintech-Industrie einzutauchen und diese aktiv mitzugestalten.

Mehr Informationen zu PAIR Finance findest Du unter www.pairfinance.com/ und www.pairfinance.com/karriere/ sowie unter https://www.kununu.com/de/pair-finance1

As a part of Strategic Growth Businesses (SGB) of Amadeus, Travel Audience unit is the world’s leading data-driven travel advertising platform. The business unit harnesses the power of cutting edge machine learning practices to connect the leading performance-oriented advertisers with the biggest network of publishers, reaching millions of travellers. The strategy is to optimize advertising across the entire traveller journey, identify and create new audiences, and increase our partners reach, relevance and booking volumes.

Travel Audience is looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join our Data Tribe. You'll report to the Data Science Manager and be part of our talented Data tribe composed by Data Analyst, Data Engineers, Data Scientists and Business Analysts.

What you will do:

Responsible for the full development cycle of models from data collection, cleaning and feature engineering to prototyping and model selection to experimental evaluation to documentation and maintenance
Build statistical and machine learning models to identify online users who are likely to purchase travel products
Research and design advanced bidding and budget allocation strategies to improve the performance of our in-house bidder
Collaborate with data engineers to develop and improve our scalable streaming user profiling platform
Enjoy huge data volumes and fast feedback loops via our real-time system

Why join us?

As part of our team, you will work in a highly motivated environment, with equal opportunities, flat hierarchies and short decision-making processes. You’ll have a lot of freedom to contribute your own ideas and implement them.

The opportunity to drive business growth and truly having an impact on the business
A fast-paced industry where you handle new problems every day
An environment where you are encouraged to research, explore and try new ways of doing things
An open and dynamic culture that supports great work-life balance, while being part of Amadeus, the biggest travel tech company in the world

About you:

You have strong statistics and data wrangling skills: experimental design, data transformation, machine learning, validation and evaluation
You have excellent interpersonal communication skills and are comfortable giving presentations
You care about the quality and correctness of your work
You are curious and like to communicate based on data and insights
You are able to think about the context and business impact of the problems you're solving
You are results-oriented and have a record of successfully delivering projects
You possess good programming skills (preferably Python), have experience working with machine learning frameworks and writing SQL queries, and are able to learn new technologies quickly

For any queries, you can reach out to Gizem Turan at talent@travelaudience.com

We are awaiting your application and looking forward to starting our journey together!


Meet Ziyad, one of our Data Engineers

Enviva is looking for a Public Relations Associate to expand its newly established German office and support Enviva's ongoing growth in Europe. This newly created role is based in Germany but also has a broader European scope.

The Public Relations Associate reports to and works closely with the Public Relations Manager, Europe, as well as the General Manager, Germany, to develop and execute communications strategies to reach stakeholders including policy makers, association partners, current and potential customers. The position is strongly focused on media relations and, to a lesser extent, events planning and NGO engagement to drive market development and sustainability initiatives across Germany. Occasionally, this will also include engagements with other European markets, predominantly Poland.

The successful candidate will bring an understanding of strategic communications, media relations and/or the German energy landscape, ideally with three to four years' experience in a related field.

Responsibilities


Work with the Communications Department to ensure that messaging is consistent with brand and messaging guidelines while being appropriately tailored to German audiences, facilitating translation where needed.
Media relations activities
Develop and manage relationships with the news media
Research, develop, and pitch story ideas to the media
Coordinate interviews, briefings and written responses to media inquires
Build relationships with partner associations, think tanks, and other thought leaders
Identify opportunities for sponsorship and community engagement, as well as philanthropic activities
Create Germany-focused content for the Company's website, social media channels and employee intranet, including local case studies
Support the Sales & Marketing and/or Sustainability team with preparation for conference participation or other speaking engagements, including working with Communications Department colleagues to create presentations, displays, fact-sheets, and other leave behind materials.

Qualifications


Bachelor's Degree required from an accredited university
3-4 years of experience in public relations, journalism, energy or a related field
German and English language proficiency, both written and oral (fluent / native / near native level)
Minimum basic - ideally advanced experience, in liaising with press, industry analysts, executive leaders, customers, and a wide variety of internal and external stakeholders

Preferred Qualifications - What Will Set You Apart


Proven track record of building and maintaining media relationships
Polish language proficiency (fluent) in addition to German language proficiency
Deadline-driven self-starter with good judgement and a strong attention to detail
Interest in energy markets, renewable energy sources and/or policies
A dynamic, pro-active personality that is keen to learn, enjoys networking and building relationships
Confident within your own domain but collaborative attitude

Travel requirements

The role is based in Germany but will occasionally require travel to other European jurisdictions and/or the US.

Working Conditions

The work will occasionally require attending industry gatherings and/or responding to ad-hoc inquiries before or after working hours

General Data Protection Regulation

When you apply to a job on this site, the personal data contained in your application will be collected by Enviva, LP ("Enviva "), which is located at 7200 Wisconsin Ave, Bethesda, MD 20814 USA and can be contacted by emailing privacy@envivabiomass.com, because the employer wishes to evaluate your candidacy for employment at Enviva. Your personal data will be processed for the purposes of managing Enviva's recruitment related activities, which include setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing the results thereto, and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment and hiring processes. Such processing is legally permissible under Art. 6(1)(f) of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation) as necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by Enviva, which are the solicitation, evaluation, and selection of applicants for employment.

Your personal data will be shared with Greenhouse Software, Inc., a cloud services provider located in the United States of America and engaged to help manage our recruitment and hiring process on Enviva's behalf.

Your personal data will be retained as long as necessary to evaluate your application for employment. You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data, and/or request that processing be restricted. You may submit your preferred request to the privacy@envivabiomass.com ( http://mailto: info@envivabiomass.com/ ).

job_title: Quality Assurance Specialist (Fluent English and Swedish)
full_text:
Bachelor Degree in Engineering, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics or related field.+1 years of experience in Quality Assurance or analyst roleSwedish and English fluentAdvanced Excel Skills. VBA,SQL, HTML or other technical skills are advantageousPrevious experience in creation, implementation and maintenance of quality monitoring programs with proven qualitative results, preferably in Customer Service fieldProven background of quality related analysis, with ability to draw conclusions and recommend improvement initiativesExcellent organizational and time management skillsExcellent written and oral communication skills

EU Customer Service (CS) expansion team is seeking a Quality Assurance (QA) Specialist, fluent in English and Swedish, to support expansion projects. The ideal candidate will be comfortable in a fast-paced, multi-tasked environment; will be technically savvy; and be a creative and analytical problem solver with an obsession for excellent Customer Service.
The QA Specialist will establish the QA management framework and policies to be used by Customer Service (CS) Operations teams. She/He will be responsible for performing analysis and deep dives to support the Customer Service Operations team by identifying root-causes and understanding the business metrics. The successful candidate will be driving quality to improve and preserve the highest standards of service. She/he will provide recommendations and come up with projects to drive continuous improvements that lead to a sustained performance.

Responsibilities:
Create and maintain systematic reporting systems and develop methodologies for analyzing and presenting data.Monitor, Report and Analyze Quality metrics and quality risk management, deep dive and identify trends/root causes.Recommend, own and drive performance improvement areas in partnership with Operations teams through customer satisfaction audits, Six Sigma projects, and other quality-related programs.Understand Operations Performance management of quality metrics and share best practicesProvide Ops team with a holistic view of performance and identify the levers which will drive performance improvement.Work with EU CS QA on initiatives to improve quality metrics.Interact with stakeholders at multiple levels and dynamically lead business and product teams to define and deliver solutions to establish quality standards and processes.Align and ensure synergy between Support Services and the Quality metrics (understanding the impact of Support Services initiatives in quality metrics, supporting teams with launch of new projects and products, etc.).
The QA Specialist Profile:
Analytical mindset with the ability to dive deep and have solid, structured and rational approach.Professional approach to working with colleagues across different departments, countries, at all levels, in both distributed and local teams.Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines while managing multiple projects and good work prioritization skills.Results and Data orientated with a bias for action, taking responsibility and ownership.Excellent written and oral communication skills including an ability to communicate with senior managers in the organization.Self-motivated and able to balance workload to deliver results.

+3 year of professional experience in customer service.Fluency in other Nordic languages.Six Sigma Green/Black Belt Certified and continuous improvement experience

Implementierung und Wartung von Datenanalyseskripten in R oder Python
Gestaltung der technischen Infrastruktur, Testing und Monitoring
Definition und Umsetzung von Entwicklungs-, Qualitätssicherungs- und Unterstützungsprozessen
Aufrechterhaltung der Code-Qualität durch Pair Programming, Code-Reviews und Code-Analysen
Zusammenstellung und Beschreibung von Datensätzen, die wichtige Verbraucher- und Kundeninformationen in strukturierter und unstrukturierter Form beinhalten
Performanceoptimierung von Algorithmen und Optimierung der Skriptausführung
QUALIFIKATIONEN:
Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Master Studium in Mathematik, Statistik oder ähnliches und mindestens 1-2 Jahre Berufserfahrung
Fundierte Kenntnisse in einer relevanten Programmiersprache, wie z.B. R oder Python, sowie in einem DBMS wie MongoDB oder Elasticsearch
Solides Verständnis für Codierungstechniken, robuste Codes und Fehlerbehandlungen
Erste Erfahrungen in der Verbindung mit externen RESTful APIs sind wünschenswert
Umfassendes Verständnis für statistische Modellierung (insbesondere für Regressionsanalyse und Wahrscheinlichkeitstheorie), Machine Learning und Data Mining
Du bist ein Teamplayer und arbeitest gerne in einer agilen Umgebung


Zusätzlich zu einem attraktiven Gehalt fördern wir Deine berufliche Entwicklung durch regelmäßige und systematische Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten.

Als ein erfinderisches, vielfältiges und dynamisches internationales Team teilen wir unser Wissen und arbeiten zusammen. Das unterstützt Dich dabei, Dich zu entfalten, neue Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten aufzubauen und zu zeigen, was in Dir steckt.
Wenn auch Du unsere Leidenschaft für Perfektion teilst und eine spannende berufliche Herausforderung suchst, dann werde Teil von Reply!

Über TD Reply:

TD Reply, ein Unternehmen der Reply AG, ist eine Innovations- und Marketing-Beratung. Mit unserem datengetriebenen und umsetzungsorientierten Ansatz generieren wir die relevanten Insights um Unternehmen zu verändern. In unseren Büros in Berlin und Beijing arbeiten knapp 90 Denker, Designer, Entwickler, Berater, Analysten, Futurologen und Organisierer. Wir arbeiten mit internationalen Top-Marken, wie Adidas, BMW, Coca-Cola, Telefonica und Miele zusammen, um ihre Marketingaktivitäten nachhaltig zu verbessern.

At Zalando Premium Logistics (ZPL) we delight our customers through fast and convenient delivery solutions in metropolitan areas. Customers receive their orders the next day and in many cases as early as the same evening.

As the Business Analyst for Zalando Premium Logistics (ZPL), you will gain an in-depth understanding of operational processes and complex data flows, draw smart conclusions, and link them to actions. You will work across business units and departments within one of the fastest growing teams within the company. You will be able to have a material impact on strategic decisions of the department. You'll contribute to projects and initiatives that are at the heart of Zalando's growth strategy with senior leadership visibility.

------------------------------
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
------------------------------


Automated operational and financial KPIs report creation and maintenance to enable the team to make cost-effective decision making and ensure the correct flow of data and information.
Business cases creation to evaluate new warehouse connections and delivery areas to support Premium logistic fast expansion.
Finance process supervision regarding invoicing and cost creation to ensure the accuracy of our accounting inputs
Customer funnel analysis to provide insights on customer on-site behaviour related to the selection of different delivery options.

----------------------------
WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR
----------------------------


Data-driven mindset. Expert at Excel (large dataset + VBA Query creation). Basic knowledge of SQL and strong knowledge of different BI solutions such as MicroStrategy, Tableau.
Strong project, process and time management skills in order to drive projects autonomously, keep tight deadlines and manage multiple stakeholders of different backgrounds.
Quantitative degree (Bachelor, Master, MBA) in Economics, Statistics, Business Administration, Engineering, or its equivalent and at least 1-2 years of work experience in a related field.
Good understanding of commercial/logistic activities in online retail environment combined with finance background.

-------------

-------------


A workplace run on trust, empowerment and feedback; positive, inspiring working atmosphere

Mobilität für Menschen - weltweit. Die Produkte und Services von Ottobock in der Prothetik und Orthetik sowie Human Mobility und Patient Care sorgen für Unabhängigkeit und Lebensqualität bei Einschränkungen der persönlichen Mobilität. Mit rund 7.000 Mitarbeitern in mehr als 50 Ländern ist unser Unternehmen Weltmarktführer in der Technischen Orthopädie.

In Ihrem spannenden und abwechslungsreichen Tätigkeitsfeld verantworten Sie die Entwicklung, Test und Harmonisierung von Softwarekomponenten und -systemen für ein strategisches Projekt im Bereich Digitalisierung der Orthopädietechnik auf Basis von Internet of Things (Iot) bzw. Industrie 4.0.

Internet of Things (IoT)/ Industrie 4.0 Expert (m/w/d)
Ihre Aufgaben
Durchführung eines strategischen und anspruchsvollen IoT-Projekts inklusive technischer Ausführung der definierten Aufgaben zusammen mit unseren Data Analyst- und 3D-Druck-Experten an internationalen Standorten

Mit Ihren Ideen und Ihrem Engagement bringen Sie Menschen in Bewegung und Ottobock voran. Werden Sie Teil eines dynamisch wachsenden Unternehmens mit flachen Hierarchien. Max-Näder-Straße 15 • 37115 Duderstadt

www.ottobock.com

That’s us

TD Reply is an innovation and marketing consultancy and part of the Reply Group. We take a data-driven and execution oriented approach to drive organizational change through meaningful insights. In our Berlin, Munich and Beijing offices we are around 90 thinkers, developers, analysts, designers, consultants, visualizers, futurologists and organizers. We are working with international premium brands such as Adidas, BMW, Coca-Cola, Telefonica and Miele to optimize their marketing.

For our growing teams in Berlin and Munich we are looking for support across multiple projects.

Please indicate your preferred location.

That’s you

We believe: The magic happens when analytics & logic meet imagination & intuition.

When vision is substantiated by data, and data powered by vision. And you know how to build bridges between both. You use them to understand the world better.
As both an analytical thinker and an idea person you are driven by great ideas and enthusiastic for current trends and discussions in this digital world. You are comfortable speaking out and standing up for your ideas.

Your tasks will include

Develop substantiated and innovative customer-centric marketing strategies and concepts
Work with fascinating data sets to uncover insights from data and translate them into recommendations, constantly finding a new angle to it that advances our projects and helps our clients
Be an architect for brand and campaign performance measurement
Translate insights into comprehensible argumentations and recommendations
Develop customer-centric digital service ideas bringing analytical research and creativity together
Bring your ideas to life through personas, customer journeys, insight frameworks, and scenarios
Prepare convincing and purposeful documents: from research findings to pitch presentations and management reports as well as (co-)conduct workshops with our clients

There’s a match if you…

… like to jump into new projects with initiative and drive and you can listen, communicate and work with diverse group of people

… like to digest data & research to capture the pertinent points and play them back solving business challenges in a neat and compelling way

… have a professional work ethic & above all a willingness to learn and develop

… are fluent in English and German

… have 2-3 years of experience working in a digital agency, consultancy, OEM or FMCG.

… you have a solid understanding of the Automotive industry (optional)

That’s in it for you

You will collaborate with experienced and enthusiastic team of experts with a lot of ideas, great and challenging clients and projects – and an awesome work environment in a great time with all imaginable digital nerd expertise.

Be part of our team in Berlin or shape our growing satellite office in Munich!

We will tailor a package that’s just right for you.

Application

We want to hire you!

OK, to be totally honest, we should qualify that statement: If you’re talented, hard working, smart, brave, innovative, humble, confident, nice and love working in a data driven industry, then we want to hire you.

Interested?

Please submit your resume to our REPLY Recruiter here.
