Erstellung ausgefeilter Analyse-Tools, die täglich große Mengen von Datenpunkten verbrauchen und verarbeiten
Du entwickelst Frameworks zur Lösung unsere Probleme in big data processing, data warehousing und data visualization, development / deployment processes , etc.
du hältst unsere Code-Qualität hoch durch die Verwendung von Konzepten wie TDD und Unit-Testing
Du implementierst Lösungen auf der Basis von Ruby, Python, MongoDB und Elasticsearch
Einführung von Lösungen in der Cloud, z.B. AWS
Management der Infrastruktur für die Bereitstellung von Kundendienstleistungen
Bereitstellung der Konnektivität für unsere Dienstleistungen mit externen Datenquellen, z.B. über ETL/ELT-Pipelines
QUALIFIKATIONEN:
Du hast mindestens drei Jahre Erfahrung in der Entwicklung von Anwendungen mit Ruby
Du besitzt fundierte Kenntnisse in Python und hast Erfahrung mit No-SQL-Datenbanken wie MongoDB oder Elasticsearch
Du kennst dich mit Linux-basierten Betriebssystemen aus und bist mit den AWS-Ecosystem vertraut
API development, Database Query Optimization, Performance Testing sind deine Welt
Du bevorzugst einen testgetriebenen Entwicklungsansatz
Du beschäftigst dich gerne mit neuen Technologien und magst es in einem agilen Umfeld zu arbeiten
Du bist ein Teamplayer, der gerne Ideen/Aufgaben mit seinen Kollegen teilt, diskutiert und bearbeitet
Du bringst fließende Englischkenntnisse mit


Zusätzlich zu einem attraktiven Gehalt fördern wir deine berufliche Entwicklung durch regelmäßige und systematische Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten.

Als ein erfinderisches, vielfältiges und dynamisches internationales Team teilen wir unser Wissen und arbeiten zusammen. Das unterstützt Dich dabei, Dich zu entfalten, neue Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten aufzubauen und zu zeigen, was in Dir steckt.

Wenn auch Du unsere Leidenschaft für Perfektion teilst und eine spannende berufliche Herausforderung suchst, dann werde Teil von Reply!

Über TD Reply:

TD Reply, ein Unternehmen der Reply AG, ist eine Innovations- und Marketing-Beratung. Mit unserem datengetriebenen und umsetzungsorientierten Ansatz generieren wir die relevanten Insights um Unternehmen zu verändern. In unseren Büros in Berlin und Beijing arbeiten knapp 90 Denker, Designer, Entwickler, Berater, Analysten, Futurologen und Organisierer. Wir arbeiten mit internationalen Top-Marken, wie Adidas, BMW, Coca-Cola, Telefonica und Miele zusammen, um ihre Marketingaktivitäten nachhaltig zu verbessern.

Ready to boost your career working for one of the coolest SaaS companies in the market?

As a Field Marketing Manager for Freshworks, you will help build a multi-billion company by implementing cutting edge marketing and communication strategies for growing our business in the DACH region (Germany, Switzerland and Austria). You will be part of a super creative, fun and multicultural European team, you will also work closely with our top-notch marketing teams in Chennai, India.
In this role, you will have the unique opportunity to help reshape the Customer and Employee Engagement markets, reporting directly to our EU Head of Marketing.

Your role & responsibilities:
Understand competition and market dynamics of our core markets : Customer Support, ITSM and CRM. Define the right GTM strategy to impactfully drive awareness and demand generation in the region.
Imagine and create an annual field marketing plan to drive growth and market share.
Lead regional marketing efforts for our key products Freshdesk, Freshservice, and Freshsales to gain market share and meet our revenue targets
Define and engage successful local demand generation activities (campaigns and events) for delivering marketing sourced pipeline to attain our regional business targets.
Work in close partnership with the Regional sales leader for supporting the region on being a top performer driving landing and expansion strategies.
Coordinate the local content strategy by understanding our key audiences and industries. Generate ideas for, and assist with, the creation of high-quality marketing content for the region (e.g. video, customer stories, blog articles, reports, ebooks). Understand the different marketing content types (from TOFU to BOFU) that our target audience are consuming, and use this insight to inform and decide on the most relevant marketing tactics.
Identify local influencers, engage with them on a regular basis, for expanding Freshwork’s share of voice in the market.
Optimize our digital and social strategy for the DACH region with the support of our EU digital marketing manager and our central digital team in order to raise brand awareness and scale our demand generation activities
Drive our PR activities in the region working with our local PR agency and the global PR team.
Working closely with our Global teams, continuously monitor and research trends in the Customer support, ITSM, and CRM markets and adapt the marketing activities accordingly. As part of the broader marketing team, you will partner with our global and European marketing teams for raising brand awareness and generating new leads, through a range of pan-EMEA activities including events and different global lead generation programs.
Represent Freshwork’s in different events and marketing activities, capable of being a spokesperson in local events.

Our perfect match:
Degree educated individual with field Marketing experience in the Tech industry.
Deep understanding of the development of compelling marketing plans and driving demand generation activities in BtoB marketing working with sales teams.
Experience in Project Management: able to define requirements, scoping of project, planning activities, risk & issue management, resource allocation, measure progress, & determine corrective actions to ensure successful implementation.
Knowledge of traditional technologies: CRM (like Salesforce.com, MSDynamics... and marketing automation tools like Marketo, Hubspot).
Proficient at working with Excel, Word, PowerPoint.
Experience managing 3d party agencies, for example, designers to create visually impactful marketing assets.
Know-how in writing articles and blog posts as well as producing high-quality content (e.g. blog articles, reports, ebooks) would be a big plus.
Comfortable working in a matrix and global set-up organization.
Analytical skills: comfortable using data and analytical applications to analyze performance marketing activities and realign marketing strategies.
Results-orientated: manage and execute events and campaigns that build business pipeline and new sales opportunities.
Fluency in English and German. Fluency in other EU languages is a plus.

About Freshworks:
Freshworks provides innovative customer engagement software for businesses of all sizes, making it easy for teams to acquire, close, and keep their customers for life. Freshworks Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) products provide a 360-degree view of the customer, are ready to go, easy to use, and offer quick return on investment. Headquartered in San Mateo, USA, Freshworks 2,000+ team members work in offices throughout the world. Freshworks has global offices in India, Singapore, Australia, UK, Netherlands, France and Germany. The company counts over 220,000 businesses in its customer-for-life community around the world including Honda, Bridgestone, Hugo Boss, University of Pennsylvania, Toshiba, Sling TV, Sotheby’s and Cisco.

Freshworks’ suite of products that transform the way world class organizations collaborate with customers and co-workers, include Freshdesk (Omni-channel customer support), Freshservice (IT Service Desk), Freshsales (Intuitive fully-integrated CRM), Freshmarketer (Marketing Automation Suite), Freshteam (HR Management System for growing teams), Freshchat (Modern messaging software) and Freshcaller (Cloud PBX system).

Freshworks has received numerous accolades from analysts and media including making it to Forbes’ Cloud 100 list, Economic Times Startup of the Year, 2019 LinkedIn Top 25 Companies to work for in India and a listing on the Magic Quadrant for CRM Customer Engagement & IT Service Management. While Freshworks has had incredible organic growth over the last few years, the company also has made targeted acquisitions that add critical capabilities to the portfolio including Natural Language Processing, Chatbots, Machine Learning, Social and Messaging Transformation. Freshworks has raised over $250 million in capital and is funded by Accel, CapitalG, Sequoia Capital and Tiger Global Management. More information is available at: www.Freshworks.com.

Be part of the next big thing in travel and join Zizoo, the world’s leading boat holiday platform. Named one of Forbes’ top ‘Travel Tech Startups Taking Europe by Storm’, Zizoo is bringing boat holidays to the mass market, offering over 30,000 boat products across 500+ destinations worldwide. Zizoo’s unique business model and tech suite sets it apart from the competition by monopolising supply and demand while offering a seamless booking experience to the end customer. Backed by Europe's leading tech investors, Zizoo’s team is growing fast as we continue to transform the travel industry.

Tasks


Optimize data visualization
Maintain and build ETL pipelines
Create analysis based on specifications from stakeholders
Stakeholder management and consultation in any data related questions
Analyse data trends and elaboration of an understanding for development
Identify metrics, KPIs and any data needs to support various business units
Collaborate with data colleagues and product owners

Requirements


5+ years in a Data Analyst position or similar
Expert with writing SQLs including query optimization
Building pipelines for new data sources and model them to the DWH
Solid Tableau experience
Data modelling knowledge, knows fact and dimension tables
Experience in marketing analytics such as Google Ads, Bing etc
Strong analytical and statistical analysis skills to extract insights and recommendations
Experience in Xplenty, Snowplow and Python is a plus
Fluent in English with strong communication skills (both written and verbal)

Benefits


A transparent data-driven environment where good ideas flourish. Got a good idea? We’ll test it!
The possibility to experiment with new technology
Cross-company personal development and training budget
An opportunity to work in one of Europe's top trending startups
Team building events and a sailing holiday for the whole team
And, of course, boat holiday discounts!

We‘re looking forward to hearing from you! Please apply here.

Babbel is the world’s top-grossing and most effective language-learning app. In a moment rife with talk of walls, we’re building bridges — making the language-learning journey as exciting and empowering as possible, helping people forge new connections and participate in worlds bigger than their own.

Babbel is for everyone, not some niche or elite strata of learners. Everyone. That means reflecting the dynamism and diversity of our users, as much as possible, in the production of Babbel. We currently have 750 people from more than 50 nationalities working in our Berlin and New York offices. A culture of difference and dignity is critical to how we’ve connected with millions of users in every hemisphere.

We are looking for an Engineering Manager for our Mobile Team in Berlin, Germany!

Tasks


Manage an agile product team of eight engineers (Android, iOS, BE, FE), product manager, designer, and QA analysts.
Make sure team members are engaged and complement each other in achieving common goals autonomously.
Reinforce an MVP mindset, continuous improvements of team ways of working.
Manage dependencies and expectations, building trust with all stakeholders, and delivering on commitments.
Collaborate with product managers and engineers to influence product strategy and drive the product development roadmap.
Attract, onboard, develop, and retain diverse top talents to your team and transform the landscape of Babbel language learning apps.

Requirements


Experience leading and developing cross-functional engineering teams within an international, agile environment.
Passionate about business results and people, not just technical excellence.
Proven experience in direct people management.
User-centric prioritisation and data-informed decision making.
Ability to collaborate with many other teams.
Comfortable giving and receiving actionable, constructive feedback.
Experienced in creating and managing career development plans for engineers with diverse skillsets.

Nice to have


Experience developing and releasing native mobile apps (Android or iOS).
Deep exposure to scrum and/or other agile methodologies.
Prior work in startup environments.

Make a real impact in the world in a meaningful way at a company that values its employees.


We are committed to a bold mission: Everyone learning languages
Diversity is our strength -- we are a vibrant international company with people from over 50 different nationalities
We’re a learning company -- we provide opportunities for employees to level-up through our Babbel Academy and by attending conferences
We have a lively startup atmosphere with family-friendly working hours
We offer great company benefits e.g. a high-end company bike or BVG ticket to make your commute easier

job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Zalando Marketing Services
full_text:
As a Senior Data Engineer within the ZMS Data team, you will take end to end ownership of our Data Management Platform. You are responsible to ingest new Data Sources, often in collaboration with our Data Science team. You will increase processing speed and optimize costs of our EMR clusters.
You will choose emerging technologies and approaches to create high-performance data processing solutions that scale. You will challenge our status quo and help us define best practices for how we work by designing data-intensive applications. Our data teams aim to solve the specific problems of a very data-driven company that has already begun the journey to become a platform.

WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED


Designing, developing, and operating data integration pipelines to provide high-quality datasets for analytical and machine learning use-cases. You and your team will own your code, and decide on the technologies and tools to deliver as well as operate large-scale applications on a PaaS/SaaS cloud (AWS)
Involved in building new ETL processes that might include combining data from multiple sources and maintaining the existing ones.

Responsible for doing ad hoc analysis and building impactful data visualizations

Consulting with Analysts, Data Scientists, and Product Managers to build and continuously improve a variety of data products that create value for our business.
Heavily contribute to making integrated data and machine learning models available in real-time to our application landscape. Be a sparring partner to other team members, and provide support and guidance to other engineers to help develop their technical capabilities.

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR


Excellent knowledge in working with Apache Spark, plus very good knowledge of relational database systems (e.g PostgreSQL), knowledge of additional Big Data technologies like Hive, Flink or Kafka is a plus.
Experience doing data analysis with SQL
Solid programming skills in Scala / Java and Python
Knowledge of workflow management tools such as Airflow and hands-on experience in cloud technologies (AWS ideally), container/orchestration tools (Kubernetes, Docker).

PERKS AT WORK


A workplace run on trust, empowerment and feedback; positive, inspiring working atmosphere
Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
Relocation assistance for internationals, PME family service and parent & child rooms* (*available in select locations)

We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

ABOUT ZALANDO MARKETING SERVICES
--------------------------------

Zalando Marketing Services (ZMS) ( https://zms.zalando.com/ ) is the 360° marketing unit of Europe 's leading online platform for fashion and lifestyle, Zalando. We work with the world's largest fashion and lifestyle brands and provide them with impactful solutions across all marketing touchpoints, access to relevant audiences and in-depth data knowledge, as well as inspiring creation and content.

At ZMS we create meaningful connections between brands and consumers through a deep understanding of their personalities. We work with brands, agencies and publishers from fashion and beyond to produce innovative, impactful campaigns that reach the right audience at the right moment. Thanks to its holistic mix of cutting-edge and privacy compliant technology, in-depth audience insights, expansive reach and compelling content brands produce successful campaigns across multiple digital marketing channels.

For more information check out this link: https://zms.zalando.com/ ( https://zms.zalando.com/ )

As a Product Specialist in Personalized Marketing, you will participate in the development of new features for our advertising products, which drive the growth of our business. Doing so, you will gain deep domain knowledge and become an expert.
You will have end-to-end ownership of data: define tracking requirements, analyse large datasets to provide actionable insights, A/B test and dive deep into the results of our performance marketing activities.
In addition, you will benefit from a network of Product Analysts, economists and data scientists who share similar challenges across the company, to learn and develop your skills.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
Develop in-depth analytical (user) understanding for what drives growth for Facebook marketing and how it can be improved
Challenge and contribute to product decisions based on your insights
Drive data mindset in the team, guide in terms of methodology, support and execute testing, and be a quality gatekeeper on data leading to product decisions, even ask to revise decisions that contradict the analytical insights
Give (analytical) evidence why we do certain things - from discovery to roll out.


WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
BigQuery / SQL
R or Python combined to good mathematical and statistics foundations
Strong knowledge of A/B testing best practices and relevant technologies
Strong knowledge of e-commerce KPIs and how they can be defined


PERKS AT WORK
A workplace run on trust, empowerment and feedback; positive, inspiring working atmosphere
Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
Relocation assistance for internationals, PME family service and parent & child rooms* (*available in select locations)
We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
ABOUT ZALANDO
Zalando is Europe’s leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 23 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests and languages our teams choose to use.

Als Teil unseres Teams kannst Du Dich auf Freiheit, ein internationales und inspirierendes Arbeitsumfeld freuen. Deine Ideen sind uns dabei besonders wichtig. Nicht nur unser Produktportfolio ist vielfältig, sondern auch die Menschen, die daran arbeiten. Wir wollen dich so, wie du bist! Dabei spielen Herkunft, Religion, Geschlecht, sexuelle Orientierung oder ein Schwerbehinderungsgrad keine Rolle.
Deine Aufgaben
Als Teil unseres Teams übernimmst Du die Verantwortung für das gesamte Customer Experience Reporting und die BI Roadmap. Um diese Themen zu übernehmen, arbeitest Du mit diversen Teams (z.B. Merchant Performance, Customer Trust, Customer Care und Payments) an strategisch relevanten Themen zusammen und treibst diese voran
Auf Basis relevanter Datensätze stellst Du die Optimierung unseres positiven Kauferlebnisses sicher und leitest ggf. Handlungsempfehlungen ab, um dieses zu verbessern
Die Optimierung des ganzheitlichen Kauferlebnisses unserer Kund*innen durch die Analyse relevanter Datensätze und die Ableitung / Empfehlung geeigneter Maßnahmen liegen in Deiner Hand
Du baust ein Data Analysis Framework und eine Customer - Centric Datenbank auf, mit der unsere Teams täglich arbeiten können und relevante KPI's für das operative Geschäft ablesen können
Außerdem kümmerst Du Dich um die Erstellung und Visualisierung neuer Reports, um Ausreißer schneller erkennen zu können und Maßnahmen effizienter abzuleiten
Du bist für den Aufbau einer Kund*innen CRM Logik / Systematik verantwortlich, die es uns ermöglichen soll , gezielter auf die Bedürfnisse unserer Kund*innen einzugehen und, insbesondere bei konkreten Problemfällen, schneller helfen zu können
Stellenanforderungen
Das bringst Du mit
Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium in einem relevanten Fachgebiet sowie mehrjährige Erfahrungen in Customer Centric Attribution und -Analytics
Du verstehst die Stärken und Schwächen diverser Messansätze und mathematischer Modelle im Kern und kannst diese entsprechend als Entscheidungsgrundlage berücksichtigen
Sehr starke Zahlenaffinität, hervorragende analytische Fähigkeiten sowie ein guter Überblick über aktuelle Entwicklungen in den Bereichen Data Management und Data Science gehören zu Deinem Repertoire
Datenkonsistenz, (statistisch) valide Testaufbauten und Messansätze, die bereits in der Kampagnengestaltung berücksichtigt werden, sind Dir äußerst wichtig
Du bist Spezialist*in in SQL, Tableau und MS Excel - auch neue Technologien reizen Dich
Idealerweise kennst Du den E-Commerce Markt und kennst die Bedürfnisse von Shops
Bei idealo erwartet Dich
Die Möglichkeit der Weiterbildung für Deine individuelle Karriere
Die Bereitstellung der Arbeitsgeräte, die Du benötigst, um Höchstleistungen zu bringen
Der Freiraum, selbst zu bestimmen, wie Dein Tag aussehen soll und viel Eigenverantwortung
Onboarding Programm inklusive Welcome Day, Schulungen und individueller Einarbeitung
Die Chance, gemeinsam an unseren Zielen zu arbeiten und immer wieder Neues zu schaffen
800 motivierte Kolleg*innen, Kitaplätze & ein cooler Büro-Loft Komplex in Berlin-Kreuzberg
Über idealo

idealo ist eine Erfolgsgeschichte aus Berlin: Im Jahr 2000 sind wir mit der Mission gestartet, unseren Nutzer*innen zu helfen, richtige Kaufentscheidungen zu treffen. Im Herzen Berlins arbeiten über 800 Mitarbeiter aus 40 Nationen an der Zukunft des Online-Shopping. Wir konzentrieren uns auf agiles und eigenverantwortliches Arbeiten, Nachhaltigkeit und ein gesundes Verhältnis von Arbeit und Privatleben. Diese Werte sind fest in unserer Unternehmenskultur verankert und tragender Bestandteil unserer Unternehmensphilosophie.

You will have end-to-end ownership of data: define tracking requirements, analyse large data sets to provide actionable insights, A/B test and dive deep into the results.
In addition, you will benefit from a network of Product Analysts, who share similar challenges across the company, to learn and develop your skills.
 WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED

WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
Build and improve upon the system which measures sales forecasting, price optimisation and customer lifetime value
Act as the point of contact between Analytics and external product, engineering and ops teams to ensure key projects are successful
Build and own periodic reporting - Take advantage of the ever-growing amount of data we have at our fingertips to help stakeholders build best in class forecasting tools
Managing and leading key initiatives in the Analytics team and Pricing & Forecasting
Mentor and guide junior members of the Analytics team

The Pricing & Forecasting Department plays a pivotal role in the organisation by producing algorithmic-based price recommendations, forecasting sales, defining and implementing pricing strategies across 16 countries and 500k articles . The Department is a self-sufficient team of product, engineering, Analytics and operations. As a member of the Pricing Analytics team, you’ll build tools and data products that impacts millions of Zalando shoppers, the top and bottom line of our company and the many internal teams that rely on your analytics solutions.
Zalando is Europe’s leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. The Insights – Digital Data Analyst role provides data-driven value to both our brand partners as well as internally by being the go-to person for the Analytics team as well as the consultants when it comes to transactional and onsite data analysis.
This is an opportunity to be part of the forefront team to shape a new business venture and to personally grow with it. Insights is a data-driven Zalando offer enabling clients in the fashion industry to gain a holistic understanding of their business and consumers. This offer includes project-based consulting services and self-service web interfaces.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
You will work on consulting projects by scoping, extracting, analyzing and interpreting transactional and onsite data to derive relevant insights together with our consultants.
You will develop new analytical products through e.g. predictive modeling and build minimum viable products (MVPs) in order to test them with our clients so that they can eventually be integrated into our self-service web interfaces or evolve into a standalone product.
You will analyze the success of our self-service web interfaces in terms of usage and user preferences and derive recommendations for improvement.
You will be responsible for monitoring and improving our data quality by analyzing data from various sources, coordinating with internal teams and reviewing calculation methods.
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
You are an expert in SQL and comfortable to work with large volumes of both transactional and onsite consumer data.
You enjoy working in a commercial context and have experience defining, modeling, testing and evolving analytical models with direct impact on business realities. Special focus on models concerning customers (e.g., customer management, segmentation, value, etc.) is a plus.
You possess relevant professional experience in analytics or controlling in industries such as e-business, retail, consultancy or market research are able to communicate precisely with results.
Extensive knowledge of respective tools and methods, preferably SQL, Google Analytics, BigQuery and Python combined with good mathematical and statistical foundations. Experience in forecasting and predictive models would be a plus.
You are comfortable working with combining and cleaning massive datasets and have advanced skills in data visualization
PERKS AT WORK

You are proficient in SQL / ETL, preferably with hands on experience from a business environment.You are proficient in MS Excel: You know how to work with VLOOKUP, SUMIF(S), INDEX, MATCH and other functions, you use Pivot Tables.You are fluent in English, both written and spoken.You have a passion for data and are curious to always dig deep to uncover patterns.You are self-driven and motivated to learn and explore.You don’t mind a bit of chaos. Actually, you embrace it as something that provides all kinds of opportunities.You love solving problems.You are enrolled in a Berlin university for a full-time degree.

Hey – there’s a revolution going on! A revolution in digital entertainment. Every day millions of people around the world choose to be more thoughtfully entertained, informed and educated by listening to fascinating stories and all forms of fictional and non-fictional content on their smartphones and other mobile devices.

Audible, an Amazon company, is the leading provider of premium digital spoken audio information and entertainment on the internet, offering customers a new way to enhance and enrich their lives every day. Titles downloaded from Audible are compatible with hundreds of mobile devices, including the iPhone and Android smartphones.

Based in Berlin, Audible GmbH is looking for a Working Student (Werkstudent) Business Analytics EU (m/f/x) who will support us in creating insights & build reports that help us to make critical business decisions.

Our team in Berlin works closely with stakeholders in Berlin and around the world. You will work with data and will have the opportunity to analyze customer behavior across different market places. When working on a specific analysis, you will have the opportunity to drive key business decisions with the help of marketing teams and other analysts.

Main Responsibilities:
Extract data from Redshift databases for ad-hoc analysis using SQL.Work with large data sets using various analysis tools
(MS Excel/SQL/Python/Microstrategy/R/Tableau).
Perform data validation, cross checks and plausibility checks.Recognize patterns in the data and dig deep into anomalies.Perform A/B testing on various marketing campaigns.Create customer segments for Email Targeting.

Preferred Qualifications:
Have been enrolled in economic computer science / mathematic / engineering / computer science / business administration / or similar university programs and have at least one year of your studies left.Great communication skills.
Our offer:
This is a student position for 20h/week with a salary of 12€/h.Contribution on the long-run (ideally 1 to 2 years) as a fully-fledged Team Member.Exciting opportunity to participate in the growth of a global digital audiobook provider.International work environment in a beautiful Berlin Mitte location.
Sounds interesting? If you are looking for a new challenge in an innovative company, where you will be surrounded by an engaged and fun team, Audible is your next stop!

We are looking forward to your application with all details together with your cover letter. When it comes to tools, skills etc. we would appreciate if you could not only let us know which tools you know, but also your level of expertise.

As a Data Analyst in our Convenience Proposition Analytics team you will be regularly benchmarking Zalando’s fulfillment proposition, supporting investment decisions. You will enable evidence-based decisions with your data analysis expertise optimizing post-checkout experience at an international scale.
If you enjoy examining large amounts of data to uncover hidden patterns and trends and you surface insights as exciting stories, based on beautiful visualizations, then join us - the opportunities to make a personal impact are limitless!
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDE
Collect benchmarking data and lead statistical analyses to help our business make better decisions.
Understand and solve business challenges to achieve Operational Excellence in fluent business processes.
Work in collaboration with Software Engineering, Analytics and Product, other internal teams and resources to enable data-supported decision making.
Identify gaps and create strategies that help us and other teams scale.

An analytical & entrepreneurial mindset with passion for pioneering new operations from the ground up from a technical and commercial perspective
A business/data analyst with hands-on experience with statistical research techniques such as linear/non-linear regression, time-series modeling, sample size estimation, statistical tests, etc.
Experience in data engineering, ETLs, data modeling and data visualization with a high fluency in Python/R and SQL
Excellent collaboration skills, working in a fast-paced dynamic team environment.

As a Product Analyst in Team Attribution, you will be a part of a high-impact team that plays a pivotal role in optimizing Zalando's onsite content.
We build attribution models quantifying the financial impact of Zalando's inspirational features & campaigns.
You will be empowering our biggest client partners as well as internal stakeholders to analyze media content on Zalando web and app-based on real-time data. Your primary role would involve deep-diving into our vast data sources to develop creative solutions & analyses providing insights to our stakeholders.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
Work with large, complex data sets applying advanced analytical methods to solve challenging use cases & customer problems.
Develop and automate reports, iteratively build and prototype dashboards to provide insights at scale, solving for business priorities.
Responsible for conducting data analysis to make business recommendations and building impactful data visualizations.
Experience in formulating product questions, pulling data from datasets (SQL) and using statistics to answer business questions.
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
BA/BS or Master's degree in a quantitative field such as; Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Data Sciences.
3+ years of experience in a data-intensive analytics role such as Digital Analytics, Product Analytics or Business Intelligence
Strong proficiency with SQL- based languages. Experience with BigQuery, Python is a plus.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Nice to have:
Knowledge of statistical packages (Python/R, etc.)
Google Analytics Certification/experience
PERKS AT WORK
Culture of trust, empowerment and constructive feedback, open source commitment, meetups, game nights, 70+ internal technical and fun guilds, knowledge sharing through tech talks, internal tech academy and blogs , product demos, parties & events
Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Extensive onboarding, mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
ABOUT ZALANDO
Zalando is Europe’s leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 23 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests and languages our teams choose to use.
Within Zalando Digital Experience (DX), you will work with many autonomous teams that live up to the standards of software craftsmanship, ownership and excellence. Along with our guiding set of principles, we entrust you and your team to shape the future of Zalando.
Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

job_title: Principal Product Manager - Convenience Benchmarking Analytics
full_text:
As a Principal Product Manager in our Customer Fulfillment team you will grow and lead a team with the responsibility of regularly benchmarking Zalando's fulfillment proposition, supporting investment decisions. This role will be pivotal to providing crucial insights to our senior leadership team and management board to steer all strategic initiatives related to post-checkout activity at an international scale.

------------------------------
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
------------------------------


Own the roadmap and strategic evolution of our international convenience proposition's benchmarking capabilities through detailed statistical analyses of performance, metrics, and predictive modelling
Effectively align stakeholders (cross-functional teams, technical leaders and senior management) by facilitating collaboration, communication, contingency planning and data-driven decision-making
Lead a team of data analysts & software engineers, cultivating technical and operational excellence, innovation and purpose
Understand and solve business challenges at scale, translate product strategy to financial and operational KPIs to achieve operational excellence

----------------------------
WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR
----------------------------


You are analytical & entrepreneurial by nature and have a passion for pioneering new operations and products from the ground up from both a technical and commercial perspective
You are hands-on and have a customer-centric approach to product discovery, user research, storytelling and backlog prioritization in order to solve something that matters
Extensive experience with statistical research techniques, online retail benchmarking and competitor analysis within the e-commerce industry in the EU and beyond
Build, lead and grow an high-performing analytics-driven team of data analysts & engineers

-------------
PERKS AT WORK
-------------


A workplace run on trust, empowerment and feedback; positive, inspiring working atmosphere
Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
Relocation assistance for internationals, PME family service and parent & child rooms* (*available in select locations)

We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

-------------
ABOUT ZALANDO
-------------

Zalando is Europe's leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 29 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests andlanguages ( https://opensource.zalando.com/tech-radar/ ) our teams choose to use.

Introduction
The company we are representing as recruiter is the place where design meets engineering. They create products and services that have a meaningful impact on the world and help other businesses launch their ideas through their B2B consultancy. With their interdisciplinary team of hard- & software engineers, industrial-, interaction- and visual designers, analysts, consultants, strategists and project leaders, they can offer even more. As Employer, they often start with business development, business modelling and digitalization concepts for their customers from scratch. Being data-driven, research and analysis is an integral part of this work and all teams thereafter design and engineer the necessary software and hardware, build prototypes and accompany customers in an iterative approach, until they reach the mass production and, in many cases, even further.
Profil
At least 5 years of experience as a backend developer.
You have proficient programming skills in Node.js
Solid experience in creating and maintaining database schemas while bearing business needs in mind.
You have good experience in programming GoLang
You have an extensive understanding of asynchronous programming and scalable, stateless services.
You are interested in and able to learn new technologies and programming languages
You have the ability and eagerness to maintain open, professional communication with clients. You are fluent in English, German is a plus.
You have a hands-on mentality and you love working with new technologies and processes.

In summary, our customer is looking for someone who is a team player and aspires to high-quality work and strives to learn and share their knowledge with their colleagues. If the above descriptions sound like you, and you want to be a part of an amazing team, let’s get in contact. Show us and our customer your GitHub profile or running systems, if available.
Tasks
Cooperate with customers and partners in an interdisciplinary product design, development and operations team.
Guide junior developers and do code reviews with your teammates.
Design software architectures for cloud-based and/or serverless (FaaS) systems.
Write, test, deploy and monitor code.
Define continuous integration processes.
Document your solutions.
The smallprint
NICE TO HAVE
Experience with front-end development is a plus
Infrastructure as code

OUR TECH STACK
Programming Languages: JavaScript , C, C++, Dart, GoLang, Java
Databases: SQL, MongoDB, CosmosDB, Elasticsearch
Frameworks: React, React Native, Serverless, Flutter, Dialogflow, AVS
Communication: MQTT, RabbitMQ, PubNub, gRPC, REST, GraphQL
Operations: Docker, Firebase, Grafana, Prometheus, Jenkins,
Cooperation: Jira, Git, Confluence, Slack

BENEFITS
Compelling projects with startups, multinational corporate clients, and everything in between.
You work with a highly motivated and skilled team from all over the world in a very friendly work atmosphere.
5 weeks of paid vacation and Christmas vacation.
Stock options.
Free BVG (public transport) monthly pass.
Yearly professional Edu Budget – supplement your education on us!
Keeping you fuelled with fresh fruits, coffee, and snacks.
Modern office located in the heart of Berlin (Mitte).
Urban Sports Club membership and In-house Yoga.
Monthly external team events.
Quarterly health workshops.
You will have an exciting front-row perspective on the development of global new generation IoT solutions with a steep learning curve.

Gestaltung und Steuerung aller Prozesse rund um die Generierung, Speicherung, Pflege, Aufbereitung, Anreicherung und Weitergabe von Betriebsdaten der Telematik-infrastruktur.
Auswahl für die Analyseziele passende Datenbank-Systeme und -Komponenten und Sicherstellung von Installation, Konfiguration, Betrieb, Optimierung und Weiterentwicklung. Dabei soll eine robuste und flexible Daten-Infrastruktur entwickelt, die interne- und externe Datenquellen über verschiedene Schnittstellen integriert und Aktualität und Konsistenz der Daten gesichert werden.
Durch geeignete Auswahl und Kombination von Komponenten sind Anforderungen unterschiedlicher Datentypen klassischer relationaler Strukturen und große Messdatenmengen zu vereinen.
Mit der geschafften Daten-Infrastruktur ist das Reporting und weitere Analysen von Data Scientists zu Erkennung von Anomalien und Trends im Betrieb aufzubauen.
Diese Aufgaben erfordern eine aktive Kommunikation mit Bedarfsträgern, Datenlieferanten und –verwendern, um die Datenstrukturen beständig optimieren und weiterentwickeln zu können.


Informatiker (m/w/d) oder Absolvent (m/w/d) eines vergleichbaren Studienganges möglichst mit einem Schwerpunkt im Bereich Data Management oder Data Science.
mehrjährige Erfahrung in der Konzeption und dem Management von Datenbanksystemen und der Datenanalyse mit.
fortgeschrittene Kenntnisse unterschiedlicher Datenbankkonzepte und insbesondere zu SQL und noSQL Datenbanksystemen inkl. Installation, Betrieb und Optimierung, z.B. MS-SQL, mySQL, Elastic Search, MongoDB.
Sie haben grundlegende Kenntnisse zur Entwicklung von Algorithmen und fortgeschrittene Kenntnisse im Programmieren, z.B. in SQL, Python.
Kenntnisse zu Schnittstellenformate und -technologien wie XML, SOAP, REST, JSON und der Aufbau von Data-Pipelines..
Die Erhebung erfolgt in Zusammenarbeit und Abstimmung mit relevanten Stakeholdern (Nutzer bzw. Kunden) in repräsentativer Auswahl.
Die Tätigkeiten der Erhebung und Dokumentation können sich auch beziehen auf Aktivitäten der Pflege und Weiterentwicklung bestehender Anwendungen und deren Backlogs.
Der Business Analyst/in unterstützt und berät bei der Ableitung der technischen Lösung sowie bei der Validierung der Lösung gegenüber den intendierten Nutzer-/Kundenbedarfen.


Wir bieten spannende Aufgaben in attraktiven Positionen sowie Ihren nächsten Karriereschritt ganz nach Ihren Ambitionen, Erfahrungen und Zielen.
Werden auch Sie ein GULPi!
persönliche Betreuung und Beratung
abwechslungsreiche und vielseitige Aufgabenfelder, herausfordernde Projekte
zielgerichtete berufliche Weiterentwicklung in Form von eLearnings renommierter Partner
übertarifliche Gehaltsentwicklung und Sondervergütungen
28 Tage Urlaub
Vorteile durch die Einbindung in Konzernstrukturen

-------------
ABOUT ZALANDO
-------------

Zalando is Europe's leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 29 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests andlanguages ( https://opensource.zalando.com/tech-radar/ ) our teams choose to use.

If you are looking for an internship in which you can dedicate yourself to the entirety of topics that arise when building a people team in a startup, we have here the perfect offer for you! We want to build a company where employees can be themselves, feel good and do their best every day. For that, we need your help! Partly self-responsible in part together in the team, you will have a massive impact on our corporate culture and the success of our team.

What you'll do:

Analyze data to identify the best strategy and sources to create a diverse and fitting talent pool for positions in sales, tech and business development
Take full responsibility for specific job openings job from the description, interviewing to hiring
Support the team in planning interviews
Include your ideas to attract more suitable candidates for our company (employer branding)
Help us pick and implement new tools that optimize and automate our processes

About us

Together with one of the largest insurance groups in Germany and one of the world’s leading consulting firms, we are building an AI-based SaaS solution that supports credit analysts with credit risk assessments. We truly believe that we can build a new standard in asset management and change the entire industry for the better. We are currently looking for great people to support our motivated team of Data Scientists, Software Engineers and Business Building Experts in Berlin. Join the ride!

You should apply if the following describes you:

Ideally, currently enrolled at a university for a degree in economics, psychology or similar
Available for at least 20 hours per week
Very good analytical skills, quick comprehension, and independent working method
Safe handling of MS-Excel
Very good English and very good German skills
You are passionate about people-related issues and stand out for your hands-on approach and strong conceptual and analytical skills

The benefits:

Opportunity to shape the AI-based credit risk analysis of the future
Development of a FinTech start-up, financed by industry-relevant investors and partners
Diverse activities and autonomous implementation of own ideas in a dynamic environment
Sparring and support from top-class industry and technology experts from the investor and partner network
Flexible working hours

Feel-good vibes with fruit, snacks, and drinks and regular team events


At Scorable, we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, physical and mental disability or sexual orientation.

How to apply

If you have any questions in between, please contact us - Cassandra & Alexander - through candidates@scorable.com.

Are you up for a successful grown-up start-up headquartered in Berlin-Friedrichshain?
smava is one of the biggest fintech employers and has received several awards, including the price for Innovator 2019 and the Top Employer 2019. Our company grows by 80 % each year – become part of the smava story now! And let us grow together.
We are, smava – the online credit comparison. We make loans transparent, fair and cheap!
Join one of the most well-funded fintech companies in the field of B2C financial market as part our Product Team.
Senior Product Manager – Web & CRO (m/f)
Your passion for business and user experience will allow you to identify and solve the pain points throughout smava’s customer journey. Equipped with strong leadership skills and an entrepreneurial mindset, you will drive your data backed roadmap throughout the organization. As a Product Manager - Web & CRO (m/f) you will not only optimize but also innovate how people apply for and receive consumer loans with the customer at the center of your attention. You will be responsible for creating customer facing features that customers love. Are you interested in growing with us towards being the #1 online consumer loans business in Germany? – Get in touch with us!
Your Tasks
You own and develop at least one part of the Product including all KPIs
Developing a product vision and strategy together with your team
Define the Backlog and Roadmap with a mid and long term planning horizon
Combining deep knowledge of customer, the existing product including KPIs, market and competitors in order to solve business and customer problems
Opportunity assessment, product discovery (qualitative and quantitative research, analytics, market research, prototyping etc.) and product delivery
Gather Business Values and engage your cross-functional team
Ongoing refinement of smava’s Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) process
Planning and evaluation of client and server side AB or multivariate tests
Managing stakeholder needs and interests from other departments
Work closely together with the Engineering Lead, Web-Analytics, UX and Research
Track and monitor budget
Your Profile
More than 4 years of experience in Product Management
Proven track record as a Product Manager (m/f) in a fast-growing online consumer business
Expert knowledge and a proven track record in customer-centric product development and conversion rate optimization
Experience in agile and lean product management methods (Scrum, Kanban, Prototyping, ...)
Strong leader with an entrepreneurial drive and focus on business impact
You want to build products your customer loves
Passion for fast learning and continuously improving yourself
Experienced in managing stakeholders and building relationships across the whole organization
Fluent in English and German
Nice-to-have
Work experience in FinTech domain, bank or some other financial sector
Knowledge in consumer psychology (limbic map, behavior patterns, etc.)
Worked in AGILE using Atlassian Suite of products
What we offer
Signing bonus, because every great decision should be rewarded
Relocation bonus (in case you are relocating to Berlin)
Development opportunity to lead an Intern, Requirement Analyst or Junior PM
An exciting opportunity in an innovative and fast-growing Fintech company
Paid education (e.g. trainings, workshops, conferences)
Employer-funded pension
Subsidized lunch offer (smunch.co) and subsidized public transport ticket (VBB Umweltkarte)
Discounted fitness offers close to the office
Flexible working hours
Language courses
Brown Bag Lunches, Hackathons, Beer Friday, Cookie Friday, Mystery Lunch and team events
Open communication, flat hierarchy and fast execution
Smart colleagues from all around the world (35+ nationalities)
Contact
CV, salary expectations and earliest starting date addressed to Natalia Nehring (030 - 6174800 -14)
In case you are not an EU citizen speaking fluent German, we also need a copy of your academic degree & valid passport
If you already have a Blue Card, Visa or Work Permit, please let us know
Note that it will be difficult to proceed with your application without the documents mentioned above.

Wir suchen zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt einen
Account Manager (m/w/d)
(unbefristet) in Voll- oder Teilzeit am Standort in Berlin

Dein Verantwortungsbereich beinhaltet:
Du baust nachhaltige und vertrauensvolle Beziehungen zu unseren Kunden auf.
Du nimmst aktiv deren Bedürfnisse und Erwartungen wahr und berätst sie auf Basis vorangegangener Bedarfsanalysen auch in komplexen Fragestellungen rund um unsere Produkt- und Dienstleistungsangebote.
Du identifizierst Cross- und Up-Selling-Potenziale und leitest entsprechende Maßnahmen sowie Angebote zur Platzierung unserer Produkte ab.
Im Rahmen eines umfassenden Consultings bereitest Du strategische Handlungsempfehlungen für Deine Kunden auf und unterstützt bei der Erstellung von Entscheidungsvorlagen.
Du überwachst aktiv die Kennzahlen der Kundenportfolien und kommunizierst mit den verschiedenen internen Schnittstellen, um Maßnahmen zu initiieren.

Deine wichtigsten Fähigkeiten sind für uns:
Du verfügst über ein abgeschlossenes wirtschaftswissenschaftliches oder vergleichbares Studium sowie idealerweise 2-4 Jahre Berufserfahrung.
Erste Erfahrungen im finanzwirtschaftlichen Umfeld (u. a. Versicherungen, Banken, Finanzdienstleistungsunternehmen) oder im Consulting-/Dienstleistungssektor sowie Kenntnisse im Inkasso- oder Versicherungsrecht sind von Vorteil.
Deine Arbeitsweise ist stark ergebnisorientiert, hands-on und gleichzeitig geprägt von einem hohen Qualitätsanspruch.
Eigeninitiative, Offenheit für Neues und die Bereitschaft sich stetig weiterzuentwickeln sind für Dich selbstverständlich.
Unternehmerisches und analytisches Denken sowie ein sensibles Gespür für Kundenbedürfnisse und eine hohe Problemlösungskompetenz runden Dein Profil ab.

Wir bieten Dir:
Hohe Flexibilität: Damit Privates nicht zu kurz kommt, unterstützen wir Dich mit flexiblen Arbeitszeitmodellen – Gleitzeit in Vollzeit oder Teilzeit.
Attraktive Zusatzleistungen: Unsere Mitarbeiter erfreuen sich neben dem Fixgehalt an einer Beteiligung am Konzern- und Unternehmenserfolg sowie einem Zuschuss zu vermögenswirksamen Leistungen.
Ausgefallene Feiern: Wir veranstalten After-Work-Partys, Team-Events und Sommer- & Weihnachtsfeiern.
Selbstverständliche Angebote: Wir bieten Dir kostenlose Obstkörbe und Wasserspender für Deine tägliche Versorgung am Arbeitsplatz.
Vielfältige Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten: Wir bieten eine Vielzahl an internen Weiterbildungsangeboten, sowie persönliche E-Learning-Angebote - auch für zu Hause.
Starke Sportangebote: Wir bieten Rabatte für Fitnessstudios in der Umgebung und veranstalten Firmenläufe, an denen wir als Team antreten.
Gesundheitliche Fürsorge: Mithilfe unseres Betriebssozialdienstes und eigener Betriebsärzte kümmern wir uns um Deine Gesundheit.
Neue Chancen: Auch als Berufs- oder Quereinsteiger erhältst Du die Möglichkeit, Dich in abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben einzuarbeiten.
Offene Unternehmenskultur: Wir stehen für Vielfalt im Unternehmen - und das in jeder Hinsicht. Zum Beispiel fördern wir mit unserem LGBTIQ-Netzwerk „be.queer“ ein offenes Arbeitsumfeld für alle Mitarbeiter.
Das sind wir:
Mal ehrlich: Finanzthemen sind kompliziert. Darum sind wir bei Arvato Financial Solutions stolz darauf, sowohl international agierende als auch renommierte, lokale Unternehmen durch die komplexe Welt der Zahlungsströme zu steuern. Ganz gleich ob unsere Kunden im E-Commerce Schuhe verkaufen oder Telekommunikationsdienstleistungen anbieten, unsere Dienstleistungen sichern effizientes Credit Management für bestmögliche finanzielle Performance. Dazu lösen unsere rund 7.500 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter täglich neue Herausforderungen im Zahlungsverkehr und komplexe Datenrätsel – clever, analytisch und mit Blick für jedes Detail – denn das ist unsere DNA. Wir suchen Kolleginnen und Kollegen, die Lust haben mitzugestalten und genau hinzuschauen - egal ob Berufsanfänger, IT-Spezialisten, Data Analysten, Sachbearbeiter, Führungskräfte oder Quereinsteiger. Und dank unserer Präsenz in rund 20 Ländern mit Fokus auf Europa und Amerika ist ein passender Job zumeist in der Nähe. Innovate yourself.
Im Geschäftsbereich Accounting und Payment bieten wir konkrete Antworten auf die Herausforderungen unser Kunden, insbesondere wenn es um die Erschließung von Kaufkraft, internationaler Märkte, das Stärken der Kundenbeziehung und die Digitalisierung von Unternehmen geht. Dazu setzen wir auf passgenaue Gesamtpakete, Plattformen sowie den gezielten Einsatz von Robots, künstlicher Intelligenz und Big Data Analytics.

Wir halten was wir versprechen:
Mehr Informationen unter www.innovateyourself.de. Bist Du schon überzeugt? Dann freuen wir uns auf Deine aussagekräftige Online-Bewerbung mit Gehaltsvorstellung und frühestmöglichen Eintrittsdatum.

Dazu lösen unsere rund 7.500 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter täglich neue Herausforderungen im Zahlungsverkehr und komplexe Datenrätsel – clever, analytisch und mit Blick für jedes Detail – denn das ist unsere DNA. Wir suchen Kolleginnen und Kollegen, die Lust haben mitzugestalten und genau hinzuschauen - egal ob Berufsanfänger, IT-Spezialisten, Data Analysten, Sachbearbeiter, Führungskräfte oder Quereinsteiger. Und dank unserer Präsenz in rund 20 Ländern mit Fokus auf Europa und Amerika ist ein passender Job zumeist in der Nähe. Innovate yourself.
Im Geschäftsbereich Accounting und Payment bieten wir konkrete Antworten auf die Herausforderungen unser Kunden, insbesondere wenn es um die Erschließung von Kaufkraft, internationaler Märkte, das Stärken der Kundenbeziehung und die Digitalisierung von Unternehmen geht. Dazu setzen wir auf passgenaue Gesamtpakete, Plattformen sowie den gezielten Einsatz von Robots, künstlicher Intelligenz und Big Data Analytics.

Fit Analytics ( http://www.fitanalytics.com/ ) — the world's leading size advisor solution for online clothes shopping — is looking for a motivated full-time Back-end Developer (m/f/d). You will work with the largest and most extensive data set in the industry to help ensure accuracy in clothing and apparel fit prediction. If you're passionate about writing correct, elegant, flexible and performant code and ready to use your skills to shape the future of the online fashion industry, we want to hear from you!

Who We Are

Based in Berlin and Chicago, we're a team of data scientists, fashionistas, physicists, business analysts, designers, and hackers, working together to tackle a single problem: making it easy for online shoppers to find the right clothes size. We help some of the world's largest clothing brands solve sizing issues, boost conversions and slash returns.

What We Do

The Fit Analytics' platform combines the world's largest database of garment and fit information with hundreds of billions of purchase records and consumer preferences. Our products Fit Finder, Fit Connect, Fit Intelligence and Fit Source help clothing and apparel companies instantly access the power of machine learning to deliver a perfect fit for customers.By applying the power of machine learning to this unique data set, we've created a range of innovative solutions to help drive improvements throughout the apparel lifecycle from manufacturing to marketing. Leading apparel brands and retailers across six continents trust our platform to solve sizing at scale and deliver meaningful bottom-line impact. Our clients include the likes of Zara, Asos, Hugo Boss, JD Sports, Bershka, The North Face, Tommy Hilfiger, Uniqlo, Calvin Klein and many more!

What The Role Involves


Improving existing architecture to ensure scalability of the system ( >1 million requests per minute)
Organizing and restructuring existing and new code in microservices using Docker and Kubernetes
Cloud Native: Developing and deploying microservices on the Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
Adjusting data structures to new products and product features by reviewing use cases and modifying data structures
Writing sophisticated Node.js-code that is flexible enough to implement the broad variety of different data feeds of our 100+ clients
Coaching / mentoring other team members
Actively participating in a Kanban workflow and in team retrospectives that take place on a regular basis
Teamwork and peer review
Proactively exchanging ideas and sharing knowledge with other technical teams such as the Data Science team
Having a direct impact on how tens of millions of people buy clothes online

What We're Looking for in You


University degree in Computer Science or Mathematics
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong ECMAScript 2015 programming skills (Node.js; back-end only)
Disciplined approach to testing and quality assurance
Familiarity with Linux and Git
Relational database design and SQL programming skills (MySQL, PostgreSQL) is an advantage
Experience with cloud computing (Docker, Kubernetes) is an advantage
CoffeeScript experience is an advantage (part of our current codebase is CoffeeScript)
Practical experience in a commercial company is an advantage
Fluent English and excellent communication skills

What We Offer You


Hands-on experience building a product that is revolutionizing the apparel & footwear market
The opportunity to become a key part of Fit Analytics' growth story
A competitive salary
A spot in our smart, creative and highly motivated international team
Daily breakfast and lunch plus regular team events

Why We're Different

We're not sitting around wondering what the product is and burning other people's money while expecting everyone to work ridiculous hours for little reward. We're profitable, organized, and already providing a unique solution that delivers huge value to our partners while helping millions of people a month shop better online.

If you're excellent at what you do and want to apply those skills to solving a genuinely hard problem together with a great bunch of people, you've come to the right place. To take the next step, send us your CV and a brief message explaining why you're the perfect fit!

Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
Relocation assistance for internationals, PME family service and parent & child rooms* (*available in select locations)
We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
ABOUT ZALANDO
Zalando is Europe’s leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 23 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests and languages our teams choose to use.

As a Product Analyst in Team Attribution, you will be a part of a high-impact team that plays a pivotal role in optimizing Zalando's onsite content.
We build attribution models quantifying the financial impact of Zalando's inspirational features & campaigns.
You will be empowering our biggest client partners as well as internal stakeholders to analyze media content on Zalando web and app-based on real-time data. Your primary role would involve deep-diving into our vast data sources to develop creative solutions & analyses providing insights to our stakeholders.
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
Work with large, complex data sets applying advanced analytical methods to solve challenging use cases & customer problems.
Develop and automate reports, iteratively build and prototype dashboards to provide insights at scale, solving for business priorities.
Responsible for conducting data analysis to make business recommendations and building impactful data visualizations.
Experience in formulating product questions, pulling data from datasets (SQL) and using statistics to answer business questions.
WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR
BA/BS or Master's degree in a quantitative field such as; Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Data Sciences.
3+ years of experience in a data-intensive analytics role such as Digital Analytics, Product Analytics or Business Intelligence
Strong proficiency with SQL- based languages. Experience with BigQuery, Python is a plus.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Nice to have:
Knowledge of statistical packages (Python/R, etc.)
Google Analytics Certification/experience
PERKS AT WORK
Culture of trust, empowerment and constructive feedback, open source commitment, meetups, game nights, 70+ internal technical and fun guilds, knowledge sharing through tech talks, internal tech academy and blogs , product demos, parties & events
Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Extensive onboarding, mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.
ABOUT ZALANDO
Zalando is Europe’s leading online platform for fashion, connecting customers, brands and partners across 17 markets. We drive digital solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to more than 23 million active customers through diverse skill-sets, interests and languages our teams choose to use.
Within Zalando Digital Experience (DX), you will work with many autonomous teams that live up to the standards of software craftsmanship, ownership and excellence. Along with our guiding set of principles, we entrust you and your team to shape the future of Zalando.
Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

Scout24 operates ImmobilienScout24 – the leading digital real estate classifieds platform in Germany, based on consumer traffic and time spent as well as customer numbers and listings. As market leader we have built an extensive dataset on offers and demand in the German real estate market for more than 20 years now. Our Data& Analytics team plays a key role in taking this data, and turning it into smart products with the use of state-of-the-art Machine Learning. Thus, we empower a more personalized user experience, make the real estate market more transparent and bring tedious offline tasks during real estate transactions online – all aligned to our company goal of turning www.immobilienscout24.de ( http://www.immobilienscout24.de/ ) into the networked marketplace for real estates.

About the role:
This is a key role within our company wide segment model, acting as an interface between marketing/product and IT towards the data department. It Is ideal for someone who enjoys being in the midst of activities, always exploring new opportunities and new ways to help solve business issues from a technical point of view with strong analytical perspective. You will be involved in working with cutting-edge technologies together with a big group of Analysts to drive data driven development at Scout24.

What we need from you:

You are responsible for the preservation and improvement of consistent tracking logics and data layers across platforms (Web, Apps) and analytics systems, including further automation of the quality assurance process for our business verticals
You are the single point of contact for your team when it comes to technical questions regarding digital analytics
You will improve the access to big consumer data via Big Query and similar databases
You generate solutions for improving complex tracking processes (e.g. enhanced e-commerce concepts or customized business measurements) using our tag management systems
You will work with business and technical colleagues to help understand their needs and derive optimizations for analytics environments
You act out your analytical streak within the Data & Analytics team

What we need you to bring:

You have a degree in Computer Science or a related field
You have a deep understanding of web and app technologies (JavaScript, JSON, HTML, Cookies)
Knowledge of web analytics and AB testing tools such as Google Analytics, comScore MMX, Adjust, Optimizely.
Experience with tag management tools like Tealium and Google Tag Manager.
Analytical and conceptual way of working.
You have very good communication skills as you interact as the interface between marketing/product and the data department.

Nice to have:

Experience in digital marketing or eCommerce spheres

What you can expect from us:
At Scout24 we value the diversity of our employees as much as our users' individual life scripts. Our doors are open for everyone and free of stereotyped thinking. The power of our team grows with the variety of individual perspectives. Our culture embraces a workplace that fits in with your personal way of life. Together, we build leading digital marketplaces in Europe. Some of the things we offer include:


An environment that provides the opportunity for impact you would find in a start-up combined with the resources of a market leader
Competitive salaries, an attractive company pension plan and personal benefits such as gym membership discount as a start
Great work-life balance, including flexible working hours, home office and 30 days of vacation annually
A commitment to diversity and a positive environment where we are not just colleagues but teammates and friends
Continuous development including skills training, language courses, and many other workshops and sessions
Our on-site canteen, fresh fruit, free drinks and more.
Extra for our Techies: modern Stack, higher potential for development within the Tech Benchmark, learning is daily part of our culture!

Wir suchen zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt einen
(Senior-) Projektmanager Business Development (m/w/d)
(unbefristet) in Vollzeit am Standort Berlin oder Münster
Dein Verantwortungsbereich beinhaltet:
Als (Senior-) Projektmanager (m/w/d) übernimmst Du Verantwortung für die Leitung und eigenständige Umsetzung von Großkunden- sowie internen strategischen und bereichsübergreifenden Projekten im nationalen und internationalen Umfeld.
Aufgaben im Detail:
Projektinitialisierung (agil, Wasserfall, hybrid), Umsetzung und Projektabschluss
Anforderungsanalysen und Erstellung von (Implementierungs-) Konzepten sowie Mitwirkung bei der Umsetzung
Koordination zwischen Auftraggeber, Fachabteilungen und Dienstleistern
Controlling des Projektfortschritts und der Kosten
Teilhabe am Aufbau der neuen Abteilung "Projektmanagement Business Development"
Deine wichtigsten Fähigkeiten sind für uns:
Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der Wirtschaftswissenschaften oder eines vergleichbaren Studiums
Mindestens fünf Jahre relevante Berufserfahrung in der (IT-) Projektleitung
Erfahrung im Stakeholdermanagement und ausgeprägte Kommunikationsstärke in (agilen) Projekten
Verhandlungssichere Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift
Hohe analytische Fähigkeiten, eine strukturierte und eigenverantwortliche Arbeitsweise sowie Spaß an Geschäftsreisen (30%-40%) runden Dein Profil ab
Wir bieten Dir:
Hohe Flexibilität: Damit Privates nicht zu kurz kommt, unterstützen wir Dich mit flexiblen Arbeitszeitmodellen – Gleitzeit in Vollzeit oder Teilzeit.
Attraktive Zusatzleistungen: Unsere Mitarbeiter erfreuen sich neben dem Fixgehalt an einer Beteiligung am Konzern- und Unternehmenserfolg sowie einem Zuschuss zu vermögenswirksamen Leistungen.
Ausgefallene Feiern: Wir veranstalten After-Work-Partys, Team-Events und Sommer- & Weihnachtsfeiern.
Selbstverständliche Angebote: Wir bieten Dir kostenlose Obstkörbe und Wasserspender für Deine tägliche Versorgung am Arbeitsplatz.
Vielfältige Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten: Wir bieten eine Vielzahl an internen Weiterbildungsangeboten, sowie persönliche E-Learning-Angebote - auch für zu Hause.
Starke Sportangebote: Wir bieten Rabatte für Fitnessstudios in der Umgebung und veranstalten Firmenläufe, an denen wir als Team antreten.
Gesundheitliche Fürsorge: Mithilfe unseres Betriebssozialdienstes und eigener Betriebsärzte kümmern wir uns um Deine Gesundheit.
Offene Unternehmenskultur: Wir stehen für Vielfalt im Unternehmen - und das in jeder Hinsicht. Zum Beispiel fördern wir mit unserem LGBTIQ-Netzwerk „be.queer“ ein offenes Arbeitsumfeld für alle Mitarbeiter.
Das sind wir:
Mal ehrlich: Finanzthemen sind kompliziert. Darum sind wir bei Arvato Financial Solutions stolz darauf, sowohl international agierende als auch renommierte, lokale Unternehmen durch die komplexe Welt der Zahlungsströme zu steuern. Ganz gleich ob unsere Kunden im E-Commerce Schuhe verkaufen oder Telekommunikationsdienstleistungen anbieten, unsere Dienstleistungen sichern effizientes Credit Management für bestmögliche finanzielle Performance. Dazu lösen unsere rund 7.500 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter täglich neue Herausforderungen im Zahlungsverkehr und komplexe Datenrätsel – clever, analytisch und mit Blick für jedes Detail – denn das ist unsere DNA. Wir suchen Kolleginnen und Kollegen, die Lust haben mitzugestalten und genau hinzuschauen - egal ob Berufsanfänger, IT-Spezialisten, Data Analysten, Sachbearbeiter, Führungskräfte oder Quereinsteiger. Und dank unserer Präsenz in rund 20 Ländern mit Fokus auf Europa und Amerika ist ein passender Job zumeist in der Nähe. Innovate yourself.
Im Geschäftsbereich Accounting und Payment bieten wir konkrete Antworten auf die Herausforderungen unser Kunden, insbesondere wenn es um die Erschließung von Kaufkraft, internationaler Märkte, das Stärken der Kundenbeziehung und die Digitalisierung von Unternehmen geht. Dazu setzen wir auf passgenaue Gesamtpakete, Plattformen sowie den gezielten Einsatz von Robots, künstlicher Intelligenz und Big Data Analytics.
Wir halten was wir versprechen:
Mehr Informationen unter www.innovateyourself.de. Bist Du schon überzeugt? Dann freuen wir uns auf Deine aussagekräftige Online-Bewerbung mit Gehaltsvorstellung und frühestmöglichen Eintrittsdatum.
