Come join a well funded and rapidly growing team at the center of AI, Cloud, and Open Source as we build our German and US partnerships team.
Who are you?
You are a candidate who is detail-oriented and operationally minded, while also having strong communication skills. You have a track record of success in sales, operations, channel partnerships, customer success, or account management at a software or tech company. You know what it means to build a trusted advisor relationship with an account and help them to adopt technology across the organization. You are analytical and use data to make decisions on where to spend time and money.
You should be driven by a strong desire to build and maintain relationships with happy customers and help them solve their problems. An understanding of data science would be really nice, but is not a must-have as we can teach you what you need to know. Excellent English skills - both written and verbal - are an absolute must. Additional languages, such as French, or German are a bonus. A healthy sense of humor is also always appreciated.
What’s the job?
In this role, you will be responsible for building programs and processes that allow us to scale our engagement with partners across all aspects of our interaction. You will also ensure that the customers brought to us by partners are happy and successful, and that their customers increase their adoption of KNIME over time. You will be the main contact for existing customers and will work together with our Data Scientists and Data Engineers to understand client needs, help with evaluations, negotiate contracts, and do reporting and optimization for the existing partnership business.
We’re looking for someone to join us in the Berlin DE or Austin USA offices. Though we are happy to have applicants from further away, we’re not offering relocation benefits for this position.
Who are we?
We are a rapidly growing, young company developing analytics software for performing advanced data science. We are a highly interactive team and very enthusiastic about developing solutions for our users. Our open source KNIME Analytics Platform, developed together with the community, is transforming the data science landscape. It is popular among its very active user community as well as among IT analysts, who regularly place us in their "leaders" category - next to some still surprised industry dinosaurs. Our commercial KNIME Server enables enterprises to responsibly integrate advanced analytics into their operations.

job_title: Senior React Native Mobile App Developer (f/m/x)
full_text:
colorfy is where design meets engineering. We create products and services that have a meaningful impact on the world and help other businesses launch their ideas in our B2B consultancy. With our interdisciplinary team of hard- & software engineers, industrial-, interaction- and visual designers, analysts, consultants, strategists and project leaders, colorfy can offer even more. We often start with business development, business modeling and digitalization concepts for our customers from scratch. Being data-driven, research and analysis is an integral part of colorfy's work. Our teams thereafter design and engineer the necessary software and hardware, build prototypes and accompany our customers in an iterative approach, until we reach the mass production and, in many cases, even further.

Tasks

YOUR TASKS


As colorfy’s Senior React Native Software Engineer:
You will cooperate with the design and software team in an interdisciplinary product design and development process.
You will be involved in all phases of projects; design and develop software from architecture till release.
You will evaluate new technologies and develop building blocks for later product integration.
You will do code reviews with your teammates.
You will write performance optimized react native apps.
You will lead and guide junior developers on the team.

Requirements

YOUR PROFILE


You have a solid react native or react.js programming skills and strong experience in developing mobile apps.
You have experience in native iOS and/or Android app development.
You have an affinity for good UX and UI design.
You have good technical communication skills with peers and non-technical cohorts.
You are able to create and maintain documentation.
You have the ability to work on different projects in changing technological fields.
You are a flexible, results-oriented problem-solver and could work independently and at the same time being part of the team.

Benefits

BENEFITS


Compelling projects with other startups, multinational corporate clients, and everything in between.
You work with a highly motivated and skilled team from all over the world in a very friendly work atmosphere
5 weeks of paid vacation and christmas vacation.
Stock options
Free BVG (public transport) monthly pass
Yearly professional development budget – supplement your education on us!
Keeping you fuelled with fresh fruits, coffee, and snacks
Modern office located in the heart of Berlin (Mitte)
No boredom! Colorfy offers challenges and development every day
A position that offers you tangible impact on the company’s success with a high level of personal responsibility from day one
You will have an exciting front-row perspective on the development of global new generation IoT solutions with a steep learning curve

In summary, we are looking for someone who is a team player and aspires to high-quality work and strives to learn and share their knowledge with their colleagues. If the above descriptions sound like you, and you want to be a part of our amazing team, let’s chat. Show us your GitHub profile or Apps, if available.

We're looking for a Product Marketing Manager for our growing team in our new office in Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg.
Your Responsibilities
Develop product positioning and messaging that differentiates AIVEN within the Cloud market
Build out a core set of content that helps the Go To Market team to articulate the product vision, capabilities and differentiation.
Become the subject matter expert around how the end user selects solutions and their buying criteria, deeply understand the customer’s needs and problems (by persona and industry)
Company evangelist including presenting in person and online at industry events, forums and webinars and create and drive content and thought leadership through social media
Develop and drive programs to frame and track competitive landscape, understand target markets and identify market insights to inform product strategies and go-to-market activities
Support the sales enablement of internal and channel teams. Articulating the value proposition and development of sales tools that support the sales process
Coordinate and collaborate with cross-functional teams (including public relations, design and product stakeholders) to deliver world class product marketing communications
Focus on supporting demand generation efforts for the Lead Generation team including content creation for the website, assets such as case studies, customer testimonials, whitepapers, videos, data sheets, industry guides etc. to be used in lead generation programs and by the sales team
This role will work very closely with product management, solution architects and our marketing team
Contribute to the product based on user and buyer value, business viability and technical feasibilit
Requirements
Your qualifications:
5+ years of technology product marketing experience
Solid cloud/SaaS industry knowledge - previous experience with Analytics or Machine Learning would be a big plus.
Experience building sales tools to enable go-to-market teams and drive competitive wins
BA or BS degree preferred in a technical field
Exceptional verbal, written communication skills that consist of writing highly effective and engaging content
Product expert with experience of attending and speaking at industry and partner events
Experience of marketing technology products in B2B environments
Ability to work within a fast-paced, often ambiguous environment
Outstanding communication skills with a keen ability to creatively translate complex technical capabilities into intuitive content and programs
Interface at all levels maintaining strong working relationships across cross-functional teams
Extremely strong organizational and time management skills

Your required skills & experiences:
Product marketing experience with Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) products
Experience of large, mid-size and smaller organisations (start-up/high growth environments ideal).
Multi-tasking is essential and an ability to handle multiple assignments under tight deadlines
Creative flair mixed with ability to communicate our strategy, message and cloud solution to a business audience
Experience with PR, analyst relations and proven ability to leverage social media for business
Ability able to work in a team-oriented environment with both local and remote colleagues
Must be ‘hands on’ with marketing activities
Experience building strong working relationships and trust with Sales
Excellent written and verbal communication skills (including English) with superb attention to detail, as well as excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills
Strong experience with market research to understand and clearly articulate to the business a market opportunity, competitive analysis, or customer need or problem.

Your Values
Competitive
Results driven
Team Player
Celebrates Achievement/ Praise/ Recognition
Straight Forward
High Energy
Strong problem-solving skills
Strong Integrity
Adapts to change and can work in a fluid, pressurised environment
Good organisational skills and time management
Benefits

A dynamic startup environment with a rapidly growing, international business
Highly experienced colleagues
Cool office in the center of the city
In-house German language course for those who have come to Berlin relatively recently
Possibility for stock options on top of the monthly salary for permanent employees
You will be part of a highly-skilled, tight-knit and growing team of currently around 50 people globally, making your contribution essential to what is becoming a truly unique success story. If you’re interested, please send us your application in English.

We are looking for a Trainee/Working Student to join our Development team in Berlin at a well-funded, growing open-source startup to help us to continue to build exciting technology that make our users happy.
Who are we?
We are a rapidly growing, young company developing analytics software for performing advanced data science. We are a highly interactive team and very enthusiastic about developing solutions for our users. Our open-source KNIME Analytics Platform, developed together with the community, is transforming the data science landscape. It is popular among its very active user community as well as among IT analysts, who regularly place us in their "leaders" category - next to some still surprised industry dinosaurs. Our commercial KNIME Server enables enterprises to responsibly integrate advanced analytics into their operations. In this way, KNIME helps organizations nurture new user populations that want to exploit the benefits of data science and advanced analytics while remaining strongly committed to open source.
What we offer

The chance to become part of an aspiring, fun and young work environment.
The opportunity to grow within a quality driven company.
Working in an agile team.
The opportunity to learn about and make an impact on our products related to data engineering and cloud platforms.
Working on our integrations with storage and database services, as well as services on AWS, Google Cloud and Azure.
Attending training courses on KNIME products.

What we look for

Enrolled student in Computer Science or related fields
Proficiency in Java development
Proficiency in at least one of the big cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) is a plus.
Eagerness to learn about new technologies or platforms.
Fluent in English.

You should be available for at least 6 months. The maximum weekly working time is 20hrs/week during semester and 40hrs/week during semester breaks. In general, we offer the opportunity to write a master thesis about hot topics like data analytics, big data and more.

We are looking for the right people to join our well-funded, growing open source startup and to help us to continue to build exciting technology that make our users happy. Right now, we are looking for a full-time Technical Product Specialist to join our team in Austin, Konstanz, or Berlin.* If you think you would be a great fit and would like to learn together with us, apply here and see at the end of the posting how to make your application even more relevant.
Who are you?
You’re a technical champion who loves software and gets excited when telling the story of a SaaS product. You’re passionate about - and good at! - helping people understand technical use cases as well as demonstrating key customer benefits. Most importantly, you’re a successful product-oriented marketing professional who brings several years of relevant experience and can deliver great technical content and tools for KNIME Software. You bring knowledge and experience in data integration, data analytics, statistics, and data science software. Do we need to emphasize that you have to be capable of turning complex topics into something that less techy people can understand? Furthermore, you’re an independent thinker and can organize projects efficiently whilst becoming a trusted contributor. You hold a bachelor’s degree in marketing, specializing in product management and/or computer science, or engineering and are 100% fluent in English. (Swiss-) German is nice to have but not required. Everybody at KNIME is fluent in English and English is our working language (but if you really want to, there are plenty of people here who can teach you many other languages).
What’s the job?
You’ll join our marketing team to communicate the value of our software to our customers. You’ll work closely with Tilman from Marketing, Christian from Product, and Rosaria from Evangelism to get all the information you need to create product-centric marketing content (i.e. data sheets, presentations, videos, blog posts, and website content). Albert from our customer care team will work closely with you and give you data on which features and materials are the most important for getting customers interested in our software. You’ll be the pivotal person in making sure our product messaging is strong and consistent. You’ll also create and provide training material and software demos, and come up with product naming. As part of the bi-annual software release team, you’ll be responsible for bundling the release messaging and for delivering technical marketing content and competitive analyses.
Who are we?
KNIME Analytics Platform is popular with its large and enthusiastic user community as well as IT analysts, who regularly place us in their “leaders” category – next to some very surprised industry dinosaurs. But we are most proud of the consistently high marks we get for user satisfaction. We are transforming the data science landscape by developing - together with our community - the completely open source KNIME Analytics Platform that lets data scientists mix and match the tools and methods they want. Our commercial KNIME Server helps enterprises responsibly integrate advanced analytics into their operations. In this way, KNIME helps organizations nurture new user populations that want to exploit the benefits of data science and advanced analytics while remaining strongly committed to open source.
How to apply?
On top of your usual dossier, please tell us which is your favorite KNIME Server feature, and why.

Though we are happy to have applicants from further away, we’re not offering relocation benefits for this position.

We are looking for the right people to join our well funded, growing open source startup and to help us to continue to build exciting technology that makes KNIME users happy. We are a rapidly growing, young company developing analytics software for performing advanced data science. We are a highly interactive team and very enthusiastic about developing solutions for our users. Our open source KNIME Analytics Platform, developed together with the community, is transforming the data science landscape. It is popular among its very active user community as well as among IT analysts, who regularly place us in their "leaders" category - next to some still surprised industry dinosaurs. Our commercial KNIME Server enables enterprises to responsibly integrate advanced analytics into their operations. In this way, KNIME helps organizations nurture new user populations that want to exploit the benefits of data science and advanced analytics while remaining strongly committed to open source.
Who are you?
You graduated in computer science or have comparable experience and have already worked on one or more larger software projects for some time. You are experienced with both application and infrastructure code, and use your knowledge to build highly available, elastic applications and services to fit any number of domains and problems. You are proficient in Java and have advanced knowledge of cloud providers and technologies including AWS and Kubernetes. You are continually learning and adapting to new technologies based on thoroughly analyzing their strengths, capabilities, presence and application to your domain of expertise.
What’s the job?

We’re currently designing, building and launching our first generation of products and services in the cloud, and are looking for someone eager to be a part of that process. This includes adapting our industry leading data science and analytics platform into a managed platform capable of serving thousands of users. The ability to handle both application development and infrastructure development is crucial as we strive to match our quality and functionality with innovative solutions that can address growth, cost and durability concerns. You will work in both back-end development and DevOps roles, building APIs, services, and infrastructure while interfacing with multiple teams to drive complex projects forward.
Ideally you have experience in one or more of the specialties that are outlined below.

Strong Java experience
Experience with dynamic/scripting languages including Python
Strong cloud experience including advanced knowledge of AWS and many of their services (Cloud experience with Azure, Google Cloud Platform or other technologies is also of interest)
Container technologies including Docker and Kubernetes
Experience designing, building, deploying and maintaining distributed systems and microservices
Experience working in Agile development environments
Git and GitHub/BitBucket
Knowledge of best practices around service telemetry, including metrics aggregation, distributed logging and tracing in large, distributed systems
Knowledge of build systems and continuous integration/deployment tools and strategies including Jenkins
Linux and shell scripting
Ability to work both independently and in a team setting; with clear communication across an organization that is geographically and culturally dispersed
Desire to learn, advocate and adopt new technologies and patterns

What we are offering:

The chance to work with a wealth of different technologies
The opportunity to be a driving force and cloud advocate as we design and build our next generation of service offerings
An open and dynamic environment, where you will continuously be learning something new
The possibility to grow together with KNIME.

We are looking for someone to join us in our Berlin office. Though we’re happy to have applicants from farther away, we are not offering relocation benefits for this position. Sound interesting? Apply here and become part of the KNIME Team.
We are looking forward to receiving your application!

Wir suchen zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt einen
(Senior) Sales Manager E-Commerce (m/w/d)
(unbefristet) in Vollzeit am Standort in Berlin

Das erwartet Dich:
Selbstständige und eigenverantwortliche Neukundenakquise u.a. durch Einsatz des eigenen Netzwerkes auf nationaler und internationaler Ebene
Leadgewinnung mittels einer kundenorientierten Potenzialanalyse inkl. Präsentation vor Ort
Ideenlieferant für eine kontinuierliche Weiterentwicklung unserer E-Commerce-Produkte
Enge Zusammenarbeit mit dem Solution Management und anderen internen Fachbereichen
Repräsentation auf nationalen und internationalen Messen, Kongressen und Branchenveranstaltungen
Weiterentwicklung des eigenen Netzwerkes mit Hilfe des Arvato C-Levels

Das bringst Du für diese Position mit:
Studium oder abgeschlossene einschlägige Berufsausbildung mit einschlägiger Berufserfahrung
(Mehrjährige) Erfahrung im Aufbau und Pflege von Netzwerken als Vertriebsinstrument
Vorhandenes Netzwerk im E-Commerce wünschenswert
Hohe Einsatzbereitschaft und eigenverantwortliches, ergebnisorientiertes, sowie teamfähiges Arbeiten
Verhandlungsgeschick, Abschlussstärke
Reisebereitschaft, Belastbarkeit
Sehr gutes Kommunikations- und Präsentationsvermögen in Deutsch und Englisch
Begeisterungsfähigkeit für neue Ideen

Wir bieten Dir:
Hohe Flexibilität: Damit Privates nicht zu kurz kommt, unterstützen wir Dich mit flexiblen Arbeitszeitmodellen
Attraktive Zusatzleistungen: Erfreue Dich neben dem Fixgehalt an einer Beteiligung am Konzern- und Unternehmenserfolg sowie einem Zuschuss zu vermögenswirksamen Leistungen.
Ausgefallene Feiern: Wir veranstalten After-Work-Partys, Team-Events und Sommer- & Weihnachtsfeiern
Selbstverständliche Angebote: Wir bieten Dir kostenlose Obstkörbe und Wasserspender für Deine tägliche Versorgung am Arbeitsplatz
Vielfältige Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten: Wir bieten eine Vielzahl an internen Weiterbildungsangeboten, sowie persönliche E-Learning-Angebote - auch für zu Hause
Starke Sportangebote: Wir bieten Rabatte für Fitnessstudios in der Umgebung und veranstalten Firmenläufe, an denen wir als Team antreten
Gesundheitliche Fürsorge: Mithilfe unseres Betriebssozialdienstes und eigener Betriebsärzte kümmern wir uns um Deine Gesundheit
Neue Chancen: Auch als Berufs- oder Quereinsteiger erhältst Du die Möglichkeit, Dich in abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben einzuarbeiten
Offene Unternehmenskultur: Wir stehen für Vielfalt im Unternehmen - und das in jeder Hinsicht.
Das sind wir:
Mal ehrlich: Finanzthemen sind kompliziert. Darum sind wir bei Arvato Financial Solutions stolz darauf, sowohl international agierende als auch renommierte, lokale Unternehmen durch die komplexe Welt der Zahlungsströme zu steuern. Ganz gleich ob unsere Kunden im E-Commerce Schuhe verkaufen oder Telekommunikationsdienstleistungen anbieten, unsere Dienstleistungen sichern effizientes Credit Management für bestmögliche finanzielle Performance. Dazu lösen unsere rund 7.500 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter täglich neue Herausforderungen im Zahlungsverkehr und komplexe Datenrätsel – clever, analytisch und mit Blick für jedes Detail – denn das ist unsere DNA. Wir suchen Kolleginnen und Kollegen, die Lust haben mitzugestalten und genau hinzuschauen - egal ob Berufsanfänger, IT-Spezialisten, Data Analysten, Sachbearbeiter, Führungskräfte oder Quereinsteiger. Und dank unserer Präsenz in rund 20 Ländern mit Fokus auf Europa und Amerika ist ein passender Job zumeist in der Nähe. Innovate yourself.
Im Geschäftsbereich Accounting und Payment bieten wir konkrete Antworten auf die Herausforderungen unser Kunden, insbesondere wenn es um die Erschließung von Kaufkraft, internationaler Märkte, das Stärken der Kundenbeziehung und die Digitalisierung von Unternehmen geht. Dazu setzen wir auf passgenaue Gesamtpakete, Plattformen sowie den gezielten Einsatz von Robots, künstlicher Intelligenz und Big Data Analytics.

Wir halten was wir versprechen:
